bookgenerator.description_text:
────────────── UPDATES ──────────────

Bug fixed in 5.4.2!

───────────────────────────────────

Feature Showcases

Documentation

This is a standalone version of our Book Generator, which was developed for our Gothic Interior Megapack. This blueprint includes various features to make book placement extremely easy and speed up your level creation. There are two types of placements (Aligned and piled up) for different purposes. You can easily customize colors, position, rotation, alignment, and scale to generate new books. The blueprint is also scalable as you can easily add your book static meshes, new functionality, or other features and use it immediately.

Unreal Engine 5.3 Update:

You need to add "r.Nanite.AllowSplineMeshes=1" under "[/Script/Engine.RendererSettings]" in your "DefaultEngine.ini" folder to enable nanite for spline meshes.

augemountaintopobservatory.description_text:
This project includes everything pictured with all assets, maps, and materials created in Unreal Engine. Each asset was created for realistic AAA quality visuals, style, and budget.

Includes Dekogon Packs nested inside this package for free!:

  • Foliage VOL.7 - Ash Trees (Nanite and Low Poly)
  • Foliage VOL.23 - Ivy (Low Poly)
  • Rocks VOL.1 - Snow, Wetness, Moss (Nanite)
  • Foliage VOL.8 - Dead Trees (Nanite and Low Poly)
  • WATER & ICE VOL.1 - Icicles (Nanite and Low Poly)

Features:

  • 367 Meshes
  • High quality and fidelity texture sets – 4k textures
  • Master material setup that controls the majority of all props and models
  • Additional controls for roughness, albedo, normals, and more
  • Channel-packed Roughness | Metalness | Ambient Occlusion
  • Realistic Post Process and Look Up Table
  • Optimized for games
  • Color changeable for all painted parts
  • Free of all legal issues as all branding and labels are custom-made by our studio
  • Fully detailed models from all sides
  • This product supports Lumen for Unreal Engine 5.0+ (Unreal Documentation)
  • This product supports Nanite for Unreal Engine 5.0+ (Unreal Documentation)

VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kChQeExIzUk

Art created by Dekogon Studios Artists

A wide spectrum of medieval props—from various foods to fireplace tools to chests, tables, and clothes—will help you enrich your medieval scenes!

P.S. The scenes in the previews are not included, except the overview map.

childsplay.description_text:
Donations to support Child's Play Charity are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Child's Play Charity works to channel the goodwill of the worldwide gaming community into video games and game systems for sick children in hospitals. Child's Play works directly with hospitals worldwide to identify what kinds of games and systems can be installed in hospital wards and distributed "for keeps" to child patients. Since 2003, Child's Play has coordinated the donation of millions of dollars of games and game systems, making them a premier charity for helping children in need of the joy that games can bring.

from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Build the game of your dreams in any setting or scenario with our Level Up: 5K World Building Assets Bundle. The possibilities are endless—this massive library has everything from medieval to cyberpunk, gothic to ‘80s-inspired styles. Bring life and style to your projects with assets that let you create specialized hospitals, atmospheric taverns, underground subways, and more. Don’t wait—grab this jam-packed collection of high-quality 3D assets today and support a charity of your choice with your purchase!

creatingastylizedpropusingzbrushandsubst.human_name: Creating a stylized prop using Zbrush & Substance Painter
creatingastylizedpropusingzbrushandsubst.description_text: Creating a stylized prop using Zbrush & Substance painter Learn how a professional character artist works when creating stylized props for its characters. You’ll learn techniques like Edit poly modeling with zmodeler, Stylized texturing, Dramatic presentation, Clean technical optimization of props and so much more! Concept art created by Zachary Liao Zbrush, 3ds Max, Substance Painter, and Marmoset Toolbag. All the modeling and low poly will be done in Zbrush, however, the techniques used are universal and can be replicated in any other 3d modeling package. The textures will be created using Substance Painter and previewed in Marmoset Toolbag 3. In this course, you will learn everything you need to know to create the final results that you see in the images and trailers. Next to this, the same techniques can be applied to almost any type of environment.

advancedstylizedcharacterartcourse.description_text: Stylized 3d Character Creations - Tutorial Course Learn the entire process of creating a stylized 3d character for games. In this course you will learn how to do High-Poly, Low-Poly, Retopology, UV unwrapping, Baking, Lookdev and Rendering! BLENDER, SUBSTANCE PAINTER, ZBRUSH, MARMOSET TOOLBAG 5 We will create the High-Poly inside Zbrush, - Retoplogy, UV's and rigging will be done in Blender3d. Next to this, we will also use Substance Painter to create unique textures, and we use Marmoset Toolbag 5 to do the lookdev and rendering! In this course, you will learn everything you need to know to create the final results that you see in the images and trailers. Next to this, the same techniques can be applied to almost any type of 3d characters.

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

creatingstylizedcharacters_in-depthtutor.human_name: Creating Stylized Characters - in-Depth Tutorial Course
creatingstylizedcharacters_in-depthtutor.description_text: Stylized Character Creation Course Learn from Florian Neumann - a professional character artist in this in-depth tutorial course on Stylized Character Creation. This course showcases the entire process from start to finish on how to create stylized characters. 2024 UPDATE – This course has received a large update in 2024. Here we have added various polish chapters on polishing sculpting, textures and posing along with additional source files. These chapters do not cover any new workflows and are therefor not narrated. Maya, Zbrush, Substance Painter, and Marmoset Toolbag 4 During this course, you'll learn how to create stylized 3D characters using various industry-standard software packages. Modeling and UV mapping will be carried out in Maya. However, the techniques used are universal and can be applied to other 3D modeling software as well. Sculpting will be done in Zbrush and Baking+Rendering will be done in Marmoset Toolbag, Texturing will be done in Substance Painter. We'll also create a simple rig for posing, which we'll adjust in Maya and Blender. By the end of this course, you'll have learned all the techniques necessary to create high-quality stylized characters like those you see in the images and trailers. These techniques are universal and can be applied to almost any character.

aaagamecharactercreationtutorialpart1.human_name: AAA Game Character Creation Tutorial Part1
aaagamecharactercreationtutorialpart1.description_text:
Full Course Description AAA Game Character Creation Tutorial Part1 - High Poly Learn how a professional character artist works when creating characters for games. You’ll learn techniques like blocking out, Cloth simulation, Skin detailing, High poly creation & detailing, hair sculpting, and much more. ZBRUSH, MARVELOUS DESIGNER & 3DS MAX There is a lot that will be covered in this course, but the main topics are as follows:

  • Blocking out the character in Zbrush to set the basis and proportions.
  • Creating realistic cloth simulations in Marvelous Designer.
  • Creating the accessories and hard surface pieces in 3DS Max.
  • Detailing the character in Zbrush to achieve a realistic result.
  • Using XYZ workflow to detail the face and skin.
  • Creating stylized hair in Zbrush using curve brushes. And much more.

All the hard surface modeling will be done in 3DS Max, However, the techniques used are universal and can be replicated in any other 3d modeling package. The organic and detailing will be done using Zbrush, and the cloth simulation using Marvelous Designer. In this course, you will learn everything you need to know to create the final results that you see in the images and trailers. Next to this, the same techniques can be applied to almost any type of character.

aaagamecharactercreationtutorialpart2.human_name: AAA Game Character Creation Tutorial Part2
aaagamecharactercreationtutorialpart2.description_text: AAA Character Creation, Retopology, Texturing, and Rendering - In-Depth Tutorial Course Learn from a professional character artist in this in-depth tutorial course on AAA Character Creation, Retopology, Texturing, and Rendering. Follow along as we cover the entire process of creating high-quality game characters, including retopology, UV unwrapping, texture baking, texturing, hair card generation, placement, posing, and rendering in Marmoset Toolbag. Please note that modeling the high poly is covered in a separate tutorial course. (this course can be found on our store) 3DsMax, Blender, Substance Painter, and Marmoset Toolbag 4 During this course, you'll learn how to create high-quality 3D characters using various industry-standard software packages. Retopology and UV mapping will be carried out in 3DsMax. However, the techniques used are universal and can be applied to other 3D modeling software as well. Baking will be done in Marmoset Toolbag, and texturing will be done in Substance Painter. We'll create a simple rig for posing with Actorcore Accurig, which we'll adjust in Blender. We'll generate hair cards in Blender and render the final model in Marmoset Toolbag 4, ZBrush will also be used for a few short segments, but it's not essential for this course. By the end of this course, you'll have learned all the techniques necessary to create high-quality characters like those you see in the images and trailers. These techniques are universal and can be applied to almost any character.

basic_data.human_name: Team 17: Chains of Command
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: We love indie devs and you should too—explore a corner of Team 17’s awesome games library with our latest bundle! Experience the chaos and devastation of World War II as a hyper-realist FPS in Hell Let Loose, master Thymesia’s gruelling fast-paced combat, and become the monarch in the raucous party game King of the Castle. Plus, your purchase helps support indie developers and The Global FoodBanking Network (GFN)!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Hot games from across the pond
basic_data.description:
Hot games from across the pond. We love indie devs and you should too—explore a corner of Team 17’s awesome games library with our latest bundle! Experience the chaos and devastation of World War II as a hyper-realist FPS in Hell Let Loose, master Thymesia’s gruelling fast-paced combat, and become the monarch in the raucous party game King of the Castle. Plus, your purchase helps support indie developers and The Global FoodBanking Network

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $203. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows — and some for Mac too.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Global Foodbanking Network. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

globalfoodbankingnetwork.description_text:
Donations to support The Global Foodbanking Network are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Global FoodBanking Network’s (GFN) mission is to nourish the world’s hungry through uniting and advancing food banks. GFN unites and empowers organizations that support those in need by reducing food waste and cultivating sustainable relationships that save lives.

honeyijoinedacult.callout:
75% Positive on Steam

Build a cult empire from humble (and questionable) beginnings
honeyijoinedacult.description_text:
In Honey, I Joined a Cult you must build and expand your base, manage your cultists and resources, and increase your faith, funds and following.

Every great cult needs great interior design. Place, design and decorate rooms to keep your cultists happy. There is a whole host of weird and wonderful room options, each with a vital role to play in your cult. From polygraph rooms and spirit chambers to energy spas and the dreaded ministry of alteration.

A cult is only as good as its name. Choose yours wisely when picking for your cult, cult leader, the Divine Being that they worship, the Holy Room in which they prove their dedication and the followers that will become the cultists of tomorrow! Make your cult your own by deciding on:
*A funky symbol
*A weird uniform to impress would-be followers
*An imposing hat to make other cults jealous
*A strange relic to worship and adore

Being snappy dressers isn't enough, your cult must run like a well-oiled hypno wheel. Set schedules for your cultists, level them up and manage food and maintenance systems. Assign tasks to your cultists based on a priority system, who said micro-management doesn't work?!

Cultists have needs too and you'll have to ensure that all of yours are fed, watered and having lots of fun! You must take care of your cult's physical and mental well-being to allow them to be the best cult members they can possibly be!

Use all of your charms to recruit followers who will bring in resources and eventually climb through the ranks to become full cultists. Discontented followers will leave, so be sure to turn that frown upside down!

Your cult leader can be very demanding. Whether it's recruiting specific followers or building certain rooms, be sure to bend to their every whim. Not fulfilling demands will lower thier mood and a displeased leader won't be able to perform effective sermons.

Cultists can be sent on missions in the local town. Whether it's gathering resources, unlocking new tech or just a demand from your leader, the Covert Ops room is the perfect place to plan!

conscript.callout:
92% Positive on Steam

True horror is stitched into the mud and blood of war
conscript.description_text:
CONSCRIPT is an upcoming survival horror game inspired by classics of the genre - set in 1916 during the Great War. CONSCRIPT will blend all the punishing mechanics of older horror games into a cohesive, tense, and unique experience.

In CONSCRIPT, you play as a French soldier searching for his missing-in-action brother during the Battle of Verdun. Will you be able to search twisted trenches, navigate overrun forts, and cross no-mans-land to find him, and ensure a home goes unbroken?
  • Experience classic and methodical survival horror gameplay in a unique historical setting: the Battle of Verdun.
  • Highly re-playable with various difficulty settings, multiple endings, unlockable costumes and bonus weapons.
  • Fend off a variety of enemy soldiers and combatants with a variety of WW1 melee weapons and firearms.
  • Survive in an intense, harrowing atmosphere boosted by a unique pixel art aesthetic and oppressive sound design.
  • Navigate intricate level design that promotes item management and route planning, whilst solving complex environmental puzzles.
  • Distinct WW1 themed areas that intertwine and overlap.

kingofthecastle.callout:
91% Positive on Steam

Rule your kingdom… or watch it crumble into chaos
kingofthecastle.description_text:
Become the Monarch in this medieval party game and navigate a hilarious world of politics, treachery, and all-out rebellion, as your decisions see an empire flourish or come crashing to your feet.

King of the Castle is a multiplayer game of shifting power dynamics and intrigue. Host games of 3 to 24 other players who join as the 'loyal' Nobles of your Council, voting on your decisions - and twisting the story to their own sinister ends.


The perfect addition to your game night, tabletop group, or friends who just love to scheme against one another.

Plot regicide (and worse) in video call or couch co-op, with each game featuring them as central characters in this Game of Phones.

Rule Wisely

With over 900,000 words across 950 possible Events and 80 unique Endings, no two reigns will be alike !
  • Balance the competing demands of your Kingdom's Regions, each with 18 possible Schemes to overthrow you.
  • Five unique Regions with their own Events - the brash Barons, ruthless Counts, wealthy Patricians, honourable Grandees and pagan Chiefs.

Make History

Forge a unique history of your realm. King of the Castle remembers your every deed or misdeed and knits them into the story of your game.

  • Build a narrative across over 17,000 choices , with each player a central character in their own emergent tale of ambition and betrayal.
  • Play on after your victory (or usurpation) in Dynasty Games , with special Events and choices based on your previous game.

Beware Treachery
  • Bribe, persuade or beg to get the votes you need, or just alter the Laws of Land to twist democracy in your favour...
  • Tax to watch the gold (and salt) pile up.
  • Watch your back! If Defiance gets too high, Regions can revolt in a Rebellion that'll tear your Kingdom apart.

Look Majestic
  • Personalize your Monarch or Noble with over 10 Quadrillion customisation combinations , including premium only options.
  • By owning the game, take the starring role and appear in both Twitch and Party Games more often.
  • Will you be the one to overthrow your favourite streamer?

King of the Castle is fully Twitch-integrated and makes for the ultimate community game !

Streamers play as the Monarch and - with a simple “!join” command in chat - their Council can be joined by an unlimited amount of players , who use chat commands and our Twitch Extension to try and bump them off the throne.

warcana.callout:
66% Positive on Steam

Conjure chaos and crush enemies in a world ruled by war and wizardry
warcana.description_text:
WARCANA is a fantasy inspired real-time base defence strategy game with a unique deck-building mechanic. Take on the role of a mighty magician and face the challenge of surviving waves of unrelenting attacks whilst simultaneously summoning your own large armies. Lay waste to your rivals in either a battle-royale with up to 30 other players, or in a series of single player campaigns.

Build your deck. Prepare your defences. Summon your armies. Survive the onslaught. Will you be the last one standing?

All cards have their own tech trees, with abilities ranging from summoning buildings, units, or casting spells. More cards are unlocked from summoned economy buildings, so be sure to play your cards right and consider your tech tree route in order to have ferocious monsters, destructive spells and more at your command. Choose poorly however, and you'll be left vulnerable to being overrun with just the round timer to save your base.

Challenge yourself in a single player campaign featuring 30+ scenarios, or create your own using the in-game editor. The single player campaign makes it easy to learn the basics, understand how the devotions differ from one other and really hone the craft of a mighty mage.

Be the last one standing in a Battle Royale against up to 30 players, where at any given time each player faces off against two direct opponents. An additional Horde Mode has players race to get the highest kill score and in the Stream Sniper mode, players can experience epic social moments as part of an online community playing against streamers.

Summon hundreds of thousands of units to your army as a maelstrom of monsters simultaneously cause extensive destruction to your own defences. The different devotion and unit types add further considerations in breaking through to your opponent's bases.

Sow the seeds of mythical forces as a "Fay Caller", spread demonic dread as a champion of "Occultism", or unleash other cosmic horrors from the other selection of fantastical devotions. Each has their own unique devotion perk, gameplay mechanic and distinct theming. Selecting primary and secondary devotions for multicoloured decks adds further depth and variety to how the battles play out.

naritaboy.callout:
80% Positive on Steam

Reclaim lost memories in a stunning pixel-art odyssey.
naritaboy.description_text:
Today we’re launching Saving The Arcade World, powered by upcoming 80s-set techno-tale Narita Boy. Saving The Arcade World is a campaign that aims to raise awareness of the need to preserve arcade games and arcade game heritage, a vital part in the history of the multi-billion dollar global games industry. We’ve partnered with three leading museums of games and play, The Strong National Museum of Play in Rochester, New York, The National Videogame Museum in the UK, and Arcade Vintage: Museo del Videojuego in Spain to highlight the great work they’re doing in saving the
arcade world.

Story
Flashback to the 80s. The Creator, a genius of his time, creates a video game console called Narita One with its flagship title being a game called Narita Boy.

Narita Boy becomes a tremendous hit! Copies of cartridges are flying off physical shelves worldwide. Within weeks Narita Boy is the best-selling video game of all time, critically acclaimed for its power-fantasy wielding the Techno-sword and taking players on a journey like no other.

Meanwhile, inside the binary code, the digital realm connects with reality. Him has returned and deleted The Creator’s memories. Supervisor program, Motherboard, and her agents have activated the Narita Boy protocol.

The Stallions are coming, and the Digital Kingdom needs a hero.

The Game
Become symphonic in Narita Boy! A radical action-adventure as a legendary pixel hero trapped as a mere echo within the Digital Kingdom. Discover the mysteries behind the Techno-sword, lock swords with the corrupt and tainted Stallions. Save the world!

Pixel perfectionist – The shining example of a perfectionist at work. Experience the visuals of a retro-era brought to life with hand-drawn animations.

Explore the mysteries of the Digital Kingdom – Venture up, down, left, and right to discover the darkest depths of the broken binary code in this never-ending story *.

Max out the Trichroma – Equipped with the only weapon able to defeat the Stallion threat, take the Techno-sword and plunge it into the digital hearts of your enemies. Do not let this empire strike back , be the true blade runner .

Diehard enemies – Face foes only imagined from your darkest fever-dreams!

Show those bosses the bytes – Face-off against tons of totally radical and awesome bosses. Become the boss terminator , by overcoming the deadly Crab, DragonBot, Black Rainbow, and so much more!

Sounds of the retro-grade-times - Feel fresh waves of synth wash over you while travelling the Digital Kingdom. With kickin’ beats that will send you back to the future.

*there is an end to the story.

hellletloose.callout:
87% Positive on Steam

Massive 50v50 battles that demand coordination and guts
hellletloose.description_text:
Fight in the most iconic battles of the Western Front, including Carentan, Omaha Beach and Foy and more. This is combat at a whole new scale....with lumbering tanks dominating the battlefield, crucial supply chains fuelling the frontlines, you are a cog in the machine of colossal combined arms warfare. Hell Let Loose puts you in the chaos of war, complete with deep player-controlled vehicles, a dynamically evolving front line, and crucial unit-focused gameplay that commands the tide of battle.


Featuring more than 9 sweeping maps modelled on real reconnaissance images and satellite data, the entire battlefield is divided up into large capture sectors - allowing for emergent and constantly unique gameplay that pits two forces of fifty players in a fight to the death across fields, bridges, forests and towns on an ever-evolving front line. When a sector is captured, it will generate one of three resources for your team, creating a complex meta-game that will influence your team’s march to victory.

An Epic Theatre of War
Take to the battlefield in 50 vs 50 multiplayer across huge maps. Choose one of 14 playable roles within infantry, recon and armour unit types, each equipped with different weapons, vehicles and equipment. Play as an Officer, Scout, Machine Gunner, Medic, Engineer, Tank Commander and more to experience every aspect of World War II combat.

Hardcore Gameplay
Dropping you in more than 9 iconic battlefields of World War II - such as Omaha Beach, Carentan and Foy is at the heart of the Hell Let Loose experience. Historical vehicles, weapons, uniforms are intricately detailed, and the combat is as brutal and bloody as it was on the day. Combat takes place on huge, to-scale maps from real battle locations, recreated using archival aerial photography and satellite imagery in stunning detail using Unreal Engine 4.

Fight Together - Win Together
Hell Let Loose is not about kill to death ratios - teamwork is central to gameplay. Communication is essential. Players work together beneath the leadership of officers and their Commander to take strategic targets on the battlefield and dominate the opposition. Hell Let Loose is a game that demands teamwork and communication not only to win, but to survive.

Unique Meta Game
Fight for victory by breaking through the enemy lines on a large, evolving battlefield. The unique sector capture metagame requires teams to make continual large scale tactical decisions as to where to attack or defend. Manage resources and supplies to call in support, bombing runs, new vehicles, strafing runs and to reinforce strong-points or flank enemies. Strategy is key to success.

Key Features:

• Fight in epic 50 vs 50 multiplayer battles
• Two distinct gamemodes - Offensive and Warfare
• 9 maps with more added frequently - land at Omaha Beach, fight through Carentan and into the frozen forests of Foy before climbing Hill 400.
• Never fight the same battle twice - 99 capture point variations per map, means thousands of potential battles.
• Play and master one or many of 14 unique roles, including: Officer, Medic, Machinegunner, Commander, Crewman, Sniper and more.
• Constantly updated with new maps, weapons, features and fixes.
• True to life ballistics and recoil patterns create satisfying, skillful gunplay.
• In-game proximity voip, command voip and unit voip.
• Brutal combat - friend and foe are dismembered by heavy weapons.
• Persistent player progression - show off your experience by unlocking new uniforms, loadouts and other customisation options as you level up each individual role, as well as your player.
• Take control of a huge array of WW2 vehicles - including the Tiger, Sherman, Stuart, Puma and more - with additional vehicles still to come.
• Bombard and wipe the enemy from the field by taking control of heavy weapons - such as anti-tank guns and artillery.
• Build defenses on the battlefield to fortify your position.
• Use teamwork to smash through the enemy front line and push through to victory.
• Play the game as the Commander and lead your team to victory using different abilities as you orchestrate your forces via the tactical map.

thymesia.callout:
84% Positive on Steam

Harness the plague to fight back against the twisted monsters it summoned
thymesia.description_text:
The once thriving Kingdom of Hermes has fallen to an age of calamity.

Seen as the answer to all the kingdom’s ailments, alchemy became a widely used practice across the land, with denizens welcoming it into their homes, using it to enhance and heal as they saw fit. When the price of alchemy became too steep, attempts to halt its use were made, each as woefully unsuccessful as the last, with the catastrophic consequences felt across the realm. Within days, the kingdom fell to chaos, infected monsters prowling the blood-soaked streets, all hope of a cure lost.

Corvus is the kingdom’s final hope, the fate of Hermes resting in his feathered hands. The truth is buried deep in the memories Corvus left scattered throughout the punishing world, and only by collecting these lost memories can the kingdom be saved, but each time he dives back in, trying to piece together the truth, all he finds is more secrets.

Key Features

  • Harness the plague: Seize plague weapons from gruesome bosses and formidable enemies, wielding them as deadly weapons. Giving enemies a taste of their own medicine will be the only way to survive the horrors that lurk in the shadows of the once thriving kingdom
  • Embrace the Raven: Shift into your raven form during battle, throw feathers like daggers to interrupt your enemies’ attacks, and perform executions with the swiftness of a raptor.
  • Fight your way: Upgrade and modify Corvus’ basic movements and plague weapons, build your very own playstyle, and prepare for the challenges that await in your own unique way.
  • Unforgiving enemies: Corrupted by the plague, and mutated into monsters, enemies are twisted and incredibly hostile, challenging your ability at every turn.
  • Shattered memories: Piece together Corvus’ past as you dive back into his memories, trying to uncover the truth hidden in the past.

classified_france44.callout:
72% Positive on Steam

Lead an elite squad behind enemy lines in Nazi-occupied France
classified_france44.description_text:
Classified: France 44 is a new turn-based strategy game, set in World War II during the desperate months leading up to the Allied invasion of France in June 1944.

Take charge of a special-ops team of Allied commandos and French resistance fighters. Recruit elite operatives to build your squad, then engage in a sweeping campaign of sabotage and destruction. Deal with competing factions to build the resistance network and strike at German targets deep in occupied territory. However, the more chaos you cause, the more you’ll draw the merciless attention of the Gestapo secret police.

In exciting missions inspired by the exploits of the Allies and French, the game expands on turn-based tactical concepts, bringing authentic World War 2 combat to life. The campaign allows for multiple playthroughs that are different each time. For those who really want to test their skills, our rich Mission Creator tool allows players to create, share and download custom missions.

Every Shot Counts.
In Classified: France ‘44’s unique morale system, every shot taken affects you or your enemies. Suppress and break your opposition, giving you a brief window to flank your cowering targets and finish them off.

Shape the Battle.
Use stealth tactics to eliminate key targets and start the fight on your terms. However, the more kills you make, the more enemies will begin to suspect that something's wrong, so be ready to unleash your ambush before they sniff you out!

Build your Team.
An authentic and characterful mix of heroes will be yours to choose from, each with their own story to tell. Train, customise and equip them with your growing arsenal of skills and weapons. Raise the morale of your team by spending time around the campfire, and learning about their lives as they fight across the war-ravaged fields of occupied France.

Experience History.
Complete challenging objectives in over 45 missions supplied to your team by the French forces. Choose which missions suit your strategy to grow the resistance and support your ultimate goals. Manage your team by sending them on strategic operations.

Built to Last.
Updates and expansions will grow the world of Classified: France ‘44, bringing new and exciting elements to your freedom fight. Our Classified Mission Creator and the modding tools ensure there will always be player-created content to explore.

On to Victory.
Classified: France ‘44 is full of challenge. Work out the optimum grand strategy while deploying the best tactical play and discover the game's multiple endings. What will your D-Day look like?

globalfoodbankingnetwork.description_text:
Donations to support The Global Foodbanking Network are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Global FoodBanking Network’s (GFN) mission is to nourish the world’s hungry through uniting and advancing food banks. GFN unites and empowers organizations that support those in need by reducing food waste and cultivating sustainable relationships that save lives.

Experience the chaos and devastation of World War II as a hyper-realist FPS in Hell Let Loose, master Thymesia’s gruelling fast-paced combat, and become the monarch in the raucous party game King of the Castle. Plus, your purchase helps support indie developers and The Global FoodBanking Network (GFN)!
from_bundle.author: Team 17

basic_data.description:

level3diplomainadobeindesign.description_text: Achieve professional-level competency in Adobe InDesign with this comprehensive diploma course covering advanced layout, typography, and publication design. Master techniques for creating multi-page documents, interactive PDFs, e-publications, and print-ready files while learning industry-standard workflow practices. The curriculum includes complex projects that develop expertise in master pages, styles, data merge, and digital publishing features for professional publication design.

autocad3d_frombasicstoadvancedmodelling.human_name: AutoCAD 3D: From Basics to Advanced Modelling
autocad3d_frombasicstoadvancedmodelling.description_text: Master three-dimensional design in AutoCAD with this progressive course that takes you from basic 3D operations to complex modeling techniques. Learn to create solid models, surface models, and meshes while understanding visualization, editing, and documentation methods for 3D designs. The curriculum includes practical projects in architectural, mechanical, and product design contexts, developing skills applicable to professional drafting and design roles.

learnillustratorcc_createsimpleflatvecto.human_name: Learn Illustrator CC: Create Simple Flat Vector Characters
learnillustratorcc_createsimpleflatvecto.description_text: Focus on character design with this project-based Illustrator course that teaches the techniques for creating appealing flat-style vector characters. Learn to use geometric shapes, the pen tool, and pathfinder operations to construct expressive characters with minimal detail. The course guides you through the entire creation process, from initial concept sketches to color selection and final touches that bring personality to your vector characters.

collisionintroanimationinaftereffects.human_name: Collision Intro Animation in After Effects
collisionintroanimationinaftereffects.description_text: Create impactful title sequences and intro animations using collision dynamics in this focused After Effects course. Master techniques for simulating realistic object interactions, explosive text reveals, particle systems, and impact effects that grab viewer attention. The curriculum covers both built-in physics simulations and manual animation methods to achieve dynamic opening sequences for videos, games, and presentations.

photoshopmasterclass.description_text: Gain complete mastery of Adobe Photoshop through this comprehensive course covering everything from fundamentals to advanced techniques used by professionals. Learn essential skills in selections, layers, masking, and adjustments while advancing to complex topics like compositing, retouching, digital painting, and special effects. The curriculum includes practical projects that develop both technical proficiency and creative problem-solving skills applicable to any visual design field.

cinema4d_lowpolyplanet.description_text: Build a charming stylized planet environment in this project-based Cinema 4D course that teaches efficient low-poly modeling techniques. Learn to create terrain features, vegetation, atmospheric effects, and orbital elements using optimized geometry and smart texturing. The curriculum guides you through the entire creation process while developing transferable skills in environmental design, composition, and the distinctive aesthetic of low-poly art.

userexperiencedesignfroma-z_adobexduiand.human_name: User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI/UX Design
userexperiencedesignfroma-z_adobexduiand.description_text: Learn end-to-end UX/UI design using Adobe XD in this comprehensive course covering the complete design process. Develop skills in user research, wireframing, prototyping, and creating interactive mockups for websites and mobile applications. The curriculum includes practical projects that teach both design principles and technical execution, from initial concept to developer handoff, with emphasis on creating intuitive, user-centered digital experiences.

adobeaftereffectscc.description_text: Master motion graphics and visual effects with this comprehensive After Effects course covering animation principles, compositing, and special effects creation. Learn to work with layers, keyframes, expressions, and effects while developing projects like animated logos, title sequences, and visual effects integration. The curriculum progresses from basic interface navigation to advanced techniques used in professional video production and motion design.

completeaftereffectsforgraphicdesign.human_name: Complete After Effects for Graphic Design
completeaftereffectsforgraphicdesign.description_text: Focus on motion graphics for design applications with this specialized After Effects course for graphic designers. Learn to animate logos, create kinetic typography, design UI animations, and develop brand identity elements that incorporate movement and time. The curriculum bridges static design principles with motion design techniques, teaching efficient workflows between Illustrator, Photoshop, and After Effects for complete design projects.

professionallogodesign.description_text: Develop expertise in creating memorable, effective logos through this specialized design course. Learn the principles of successful logo design including simplicity, versatility, and brand communication while mastering techniques for concept development, client presentation, and final delivery. The curriculum covers the entire logo design process from initial research and sketching to vector execution and preparing files for various applications.

comicbookanimationinaftereffects.human_name: Comic Book Animation in After Effects
comicbookanimationinaftereffects.description_text: Bring comic book art to life with this specialized animation course that teaches techniques for creating dynamic comic-style motion graphics. Learn methods for animating panels, creating superhero effects, simulating page turns, and developing action sequences with comic aesthetics. The curriculum combines traditional comic visual language with modern animation principles, perfect for motion comics, promotional videos, and stylized visual storytelling.

adobeillustratorcc.description_text: Master vector graphics with this comprehensive Adobe Illustrator CC course covering the complete toolset and workflow. Learn to create logos, illustrations, icons, and complex artworks while understanding essential concepts like paths, shapes, typography, and color theory. Through practical projects, you'll develop efficiency with shortcuts, layer management, and advanced techniques that professional illustrators use daily.

cinema4d_lowpolywolf.description_text: Create a stylized low-poly wolf model in this project-based Cinema 4D course that teaches fundamental 3D modeling techniques. Learn polygon modeling, UV mapping, texturing, and rendering while developing an artistic approach to simplified 3D representation. The course guides you through each step from basic shape blocking to final render, providing both technical instruction and artistic guidance for creating appealing low-poly animal characters.

learnediting360ophotoswithphotoshop.description_text: Specialize in the emerging field of 360° photography editing with this focused Photoshop course. Learn techniques for correcting distortion, removing equipment, enhancing panoramic images, and creating compelling visual experiences for virtual reality and immersive media. The curriculum covers the unique challenges of spherical photography, including seam management, lighting balance, and preparing images for various display platforms.

cinema4d_lowpolytree.description_text: Master the art of creating stylized trees and vegetation in this focused Cinema 4D course covering low-poly modeling techniques for natural elements. Learn efficient approaches to trunk formation, branch structures, foliage creation, and texturing while developing an eye for the essential characteristics that make simplified natural forms recognizable. The course provides both technical instruction and artistic guidance applicable to game environments, animations, and illustrative 3D scenes.

adobepremiereprocc.description_text: Develop professional video editing skills with this complete Adobe Premiere Pro course covering the entire post-production workflow. Learn to organize footage, create sequences, apply transitions and effects, color grade, and mix audio while understanding industry-standard editing principles. The curriculum includes practical projects that teach both technical skills and storytelling techniques applicable to films, commercials, documentaries, and online content.

midjourneyforbeginners_embarkonyourartis.human_name: Midjourney for Beginners: Embark on Your Artistic Journey
midjourneyforbeginners_embarkonyourartis.description_text: Unlock the creative potential of AI-generated imagery with this introductory Midjourney course. Learn to craft effective prompts, understand parameters, and refine outputs to achieve specific visual styles and concepts. The curriculum guides you through practical projects that demonstrate how to incorporate AI-generated visuals into your creative workflow while developing an understanding of the strengths and limitations of this revolutionary tool.

cinema4d_createanabstractbackground.description_text: Design captivating abstract 3D backgrounds in Cinema 4D through this focused course covering procedural modeling, materials, lighting, and animation. Learn to create organic forms, geometric patterns, and dynamic compositions using various generators, deformers, and effectors. The curriculum emphasizes both technical execution and aesthetic principles for creating visually striking backgrounds suitable for motion graphics, web design, and video production.

adobeaftereffect_gradientanimation.description_text: Master the art of creating fluid, mesmerizing gradient animations in this specialized After Effects course. Learn techniques for generating dynamic color transitions, morphing shapes, and creating abstract backgrounds using expressions, effects, and color theory. The curriculum covers both technical execution and aesthetic principles for creating hypnotic animations useful for backgrounds, transitions, music videos, and modern UI design.

blendermasteryforbeginners_3ddesignandre.human_name: Blender Mastery for Beginners: 3D Design & Rendering
blendermasteryforbeginners_3ddesignandre.description_text: Start your 3D creation journey with this comprehensive introduction to Blender, covering modeling, texturing, lighting, animation, and rendering. Learn the complete 3D pipeline from basic object manipulation to creating finished scenes with realistic materials and lighting. The curriculum includes step-by-step projects that build fundamental skills while introducing specialized techniques for different application areas from architecture to character design.

learnillustratorcc_createasimpleflatvect.human_name: Learn Illustrator CC: Create a Simple Flat Vector Orc
learnillustratorcc_createasimpleflatvect.description_text: Design a stylized orc character using Adobe Illustrator's vector tools in this focused project course. Learn techniques for creating monster features, textures, and expressions using simple shapes, the pen tool, and color theory. The course provides detailed instruction on character stylization, proportion, and adding personality through subtle details, helping you develop character design skills applicable to games, animation, and illustration.

learnillustratorcc_createavectorknight.human_name: Learn Illustrator CC: Create a Vector Knight
learnillustratorcc_createavectorknight.description_text: Create a detailed vector knight character in this specialized Illustrator course that builds advanced vector illustration skills. Master techniques for creating armor textures, clothing folds, and character proportions using Illustrator's pen tool, gradients, and layer effects. The step-by-step instruction provides both technical skills and artistic guidance for creating compelling character illustrations with medieval themes.

level3diplomainadobeillustrator.description_text: This certification-focused course provides in-depth training in Adobe Illustrator at an advanced level, preparing students for professional recognition. Covering complex vector techniques, typography manipulation, pattern creation, and workflow optimization, the curriculum balances technical skill development with creative application. Complete industry-standard projects that demonstrate mastery of Illustrator's advanced features while building a professional portfolio.

learnaftereffectsforphotography.description_text: Transform still photography into dynamic visual stories with this After Effects course tailored specifically for photographers. Master techniques for animating photos, creating parallax effects, building photo slideshows, and developing cinemagraphs that blend still and moving elements. The curriculum focuses on photography-specific skills like depth mapping, camera movement simulation, and enhancing photographic qualities through motion design.

adobelightroommasterclass_classicccandcc.human_name: Adobe Lightroom Masterclass - Classic CC & CC: Photo Editing
adobelightroommasterclass_classicccandcc.description_text: Master both Lightroom Classic CC and Lightroom CC cloud versions in this comprehensive photo editing course. Learn the unique strengths of each platform and develop advanced editing skills for portraits, landscapes, and creative photography. The curriculum covers organization systems, color grading techniques, retouching methods, and synchronization between desktop and mobile devices for a seamless photography workflow.

adobelightroommasterclass.description_text: Transform your photography workflow with this complete guide to Adobe Lightroom's powerful organization and editing capabilities. Learn to import, organize, and tag your photo library efficiently while mastering non-destructive editing techniques for exposure, color, detail, and creative effects. The course covers both global and local adjustments, presets creation, batch processing, and export options for various purposes from web to print.

ai-poweredgraphicdesign_masteringfigmaan.human_name: AI-Powered Graphic Design: Mastering Figma & Emerging Tech
ai-poweredgraphicdesign_masteringfigmaan.description_text: Explore the cutting edge of design by combining Figma's collaborative platform with AI tools that enhance creativity and workflow efficiency. Learn to leverage machine learning for design ideation, automation, and rapid prototyping while maintaining creative control and design integrity. The curriculum covers both fundamental Figma skills and integration with emerging AI technologies, preparing designers for the evolving landscape of technology-assisted creative work.

worldwildlifefund.description_text:
Payments to the World Wildlife Fund are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

WWF is one of the world’s largest and most experienced independent conservation organizations, with over 5 million supporters and a global network active in more than 100 countries.

WWF’s mission is to stop the degradation of the planet’s natural environment and to build a future in which humans live in harmony with nature, by conserving the world’s biological diversity, ensuring that the use of renewable natural resources is sustainable, and promoting the reduction of pollution and wasteful consumption.

The WWF name and logo are used with its permission, which in no way constitutes an endorsement, express or implied, of any product, service, company, opinion or political position. The WWF name and logo is a registered trademark owned by WWF. For more information about WWF, please visit www.wwf.org

basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Need some help wrapping your head around complex subjects in math and physics? This bundle of books in the popular For Dummies series is here to help with fun and approachable lessons across a number of tricky topics! Statistics All-in-One For Dummies will teach you how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data and more! Bone up on the fundamentals and move onto the advanced stuff like graphing functions and approximating area with Calculus For Dummies. Thermodynamics For Dummies will help you wrap your head around complex concepts like entropy and the laws of thermodynamics in an easily digestible and approachable manner. Pay what you want for all these and more—a total of 16 books—and help support buildOn with your purchase!

statisticsall-in-onefordummies.description_text:
Slay statistics the Dummies wayStatistics All-in-One For Dummies covers key statistical concepts and teaches students how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data, and so much more! Written by an expert author who lives and breathes statistics, Statistics AIO For Dummies explains everything in easy-to-understand terms. Lessons, examples, practice problems, and online quizzes give students plenty of opportunities to master the content with ease.  

Inside:

  • Stats, charts, and graphs
  • Understanding and critiquing polls
  • The Central Limit Theorem
  • Data analysis tools
  • Correlation and regression
  • Get one-year access to chapter quizzes online!

physicsi_501practiceproblemsfordummiespl.human_name: Physics I: 501 Practice Problems For Dummies (+ Free Online Practice)
physicsi_501practiceproblemsfordummiespl.description_text:
Previous edition: 9781118853153

Physics I: 501 Practice Problems For Dummies gives students hundreds of opportunities to solve problems from the major concepts introduced in a Physics I course. With the book, readers also get access to practice problems online, where they can create customized practice sets to suit their study needs.

algebraiiessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

geometryessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

algebraiessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

physicsifordummies3rdedition.description_text: Physics I For Dummies, 3rd Edition, explains the basic principles of physics in a simple, clear, and entertaining fashion. Designed to be a supplement to a course in Physics I, it includes information on the basics of physics, including motion; energy; waves (sound, light, wave-particle); solids, liquids, and gasses; thermodynamics; electromagnetism; relativity; atomic and nuclear structures; and the Big Bang theory and stars. For anyone who is looking for a supplement for a course or is simply curious to learn about physics, this updated edition of Physics I For Dummies is of great value! Inside this book youll gain a better understanding of: Measuring displacement Gravity and friction Turning energy into work Rotational motion Simple explanations of Newton's laws Fluids, flow, and pressure

mathforreallifefordummies.human_name: Math For Real Life For Dummies
mathforreallifefordummies.description_text: Math For Real Life For Dummies is for those readers looking for a reference to help them master the mathematics that they encounter in daily life. Not everyone retains the math they learned in school. Like any skill, your ability to work math problems can deteriorate if left unused. Math For Real Life For Dummies is a resource that readers can use to brush up on math skills or to handle everyday encounters from making sense of checkbooks and calculating restaurant tips to understanding interest rates and investments and calculating percentages and odds. Math For Real Life For Dummies uses real-world situations and examples to help readers take the stress out of their daily calculation encounters.

opticsfordummies.description_text: Tracking to a typical undergraduate optics course, Optics For Dummies will provide readers with an approachable introduction to optical science, methods, and applications. Concepts covered will include the nature of light and optical effects; reflection, refraction, and diffraction; color dispersion; optical devices, industrial, medical, and military applications (including optical data transmission); and laser light fundamentals.

physicsiifordummies.description_text:
Physics II For Dummies covers the essentials of an advanced physics course clearly and concisely.

It walks students through important key concepts including:
  • Mechanical Waves and Sound Forces and Fields
  • Electric Potential and Electric Energy Electric Current and Direct-Current Circuits
  • Magnetic Flux and Faraday's Law of Induction
  • Alternating Currents Electromagnetic Waves
  • Geometric Optics
  • Optical Instruments Interference and Diffraction Relativity
  • Atoms, Photons, and Electrons Molecules
  • Solids Nuclear and High-Energy Physics

physicsiworkbookfordummieswithonlineprac.human_name: Physics I Workbook For Dummies with Online Practice, 3rd Edition
physicsiworkbookfordummieswithonlineprac.description_text: Physics I Workbook For Dummies, 3rd Edition, focuses on all facets of physics, such as: Acceleration, distance, and time Circular motion Momentum and kinetic energy Rotational kinematics and rotational dynamics Potential and kinetic energy Thermodynamics Complete answer explanations are included for all problems so readers can see where they went wrong (or right). This edition comes with free 1-year access to chapter quizzes online.

calculus_1001practiceproblemsfordummiesp.human_name: Calculus: 1001 Practice Problems For Dummies (+ Free Online Practice)
calculus_1001practiceproblemsfordummiesp.description_text: Previous edition: 9781118496718 Every practice problem in Calculus: 1001 Practice Problems For Dummies includes a detailed answer explanation with a step-by-step solution and narrative walk-through. Readers get free access to all 1,001 practice problems online, where they can create their own study sets for focused learning. PINs are not printed in books. They are delivered electronically for both print and ebooks.

pre-calculusfordummies3rdedition.description_text: Pre-Calculus For Dummies, 3rd Edition caters to the needs of the increasing number of students taking pre-calculus courses in high school by providing the fundamental information in an unintimidating way. In addition, Pre-Calculus For Dummies, 3rd Edition includes updates such as fresh example equations, explanations and practical examples that mirror today's teaching methods, and relevant cultural vernacular and references.

trigonometryfordummies3rdedition.description_text: Trigonometry deals with the relationship between the sides and angles of triangles...mostly right triangles. In practical use, trigonometry is a friend to astronomers who use triangulation to measure the distance between stars. Trig also has applications in fields as broad as financial analysis, music theory, biology, medical imaging, cryptology, game development, and seismology. This new edition of Trigonometry For Dummies will track to a typical Trigonometry course at the high school or college level.

thermodynamicsfordummies.description_text:
Thermodynamics For Dummies tracks to a typical thermodynamics course offered at the undergraduate level and assists readers in understanding the fundamental concepts of the subject and helps to develop problem-solving skills through practice in solving energy-related problems.

Specific coverage includes:
  • General balance principle (open systems, closed systems, rate balances, increment balances)
  • Mass balances (specific volume, system mass, mass-flow rate)
  • Zeroth law (thermodynamic equilibrium and temperature)
  • First-law balances (internal energy, enthalpy)
  • Second-law balances (availability, entropy)
  • Cycles (Rankine, Brayton, vapor-compression)
  • Non-reacting mixtures of ideal gases
  • Reacting mixtures (mass balances, energy balances, heating values, standardized enthalpy)

calculusfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Calculus can be a topic many students struggle with, especially those without a solid mathematic background. In the first edition of Calculus For Dummies, the groundwork was laid for those interested in this discipline.

This updated second edition includes:
  • Foundational review  of algebra, trigonometry, and pre-calculus concepts
  • Sequences and series
  • Common functions and how to graph them
  • Approximating area with integration
  • Explanations and practical examples that mirror todays teaching methods
  • Relevant cultural vernacular and references
  • Standard For Dummies materials that match the current standard and design

physicsessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

buildon.description_text:
Donations to support buildOn are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

buildOn’s mission is to break the cycle of poverty, illiteracy, and low expectations through service and education. They mobilize U.S. students to transform their communities through service and change the world by building schools in developing countries.

Donations to support buildOn are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

buildOn’s mission is to break the cycle of poverty, illiteracy, and low expectations through service and education. They mobilize U.S. students to transform their communities through service and change the world by building schools in developing countries.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Math and Physics for Dummies Encore
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Optics For Dummies, Thermodynamics For Dummies, Calculus For Dummies, 2nd Edition, Statistics All-in-One For Dummies, Calculus: 1001 Practice Problems For Dummies (+ Free Online Practice), and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Need some help wrapping your head around complex subjects in math and physics? This bundle of books in the popular For Dummies series is here to help with fun and approachable lessons across a number of tricky topics! Statistics All-in-One For Dummies will teach you how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data and more! Bone up on the fundamentals and move onto the advanced stuff like graphing functions and approximating area with Calculus For Dummies. Thermodynamics For Dummies will help you wrap your head around complex concepts like entropy and the laws of thermodynamics in an easily digestible and approachable manner. Pay what you want for all these and more—a total of 16 books—and help support buildOn with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Wiley

basic_data.human_name: Learn To Make Games in Godot 4 by GameDev.tv 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Been sitting on your game dev ambitions? Jump into this bundle of online courses from GameDev.tv, packed with expert instruction on the skills you need to develop both 2D and 3D games using Godot 4. Learn the fundamentals of game mechanics, animation, scripting, and more with hot courses like Complete Godot 3D Course: Develop Your Own 3D Games Using Godot 4. Get the expert advice and knowledge you’re looking for—and help support Oceana with your purchase!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Godot 4 just got a lot easier
basic_data.description:
Godot 4 just got a lot easier. Been sitting on your game dev ambitions? Jump into this bundle of online courses from GameDev.tv, packed with expert instruction on the skills you need to develop both 2D and 3D games using Godot 4. Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Oceana. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

godotcharactercontroller.description_text:
Want to build a slick 3D game without starting from scratch?

This Godot Character Controller is your fast-pass to playable goodness.

Jump into a ready-to-roll demo scene with first- and third-person camera views, built-in UI, and sweet real-time settings.

Add your own 3D models, animations, and style—because generic ain’t your thing.

You’ll master movement, level flow, and customisation without banging your head against the wall.

Perfect for Godot newbies, game jam junkies, or anyone who just wants to get stuff moving now.

Skip the setup grind and start crafting the game world in your head.

Grab the bundle and get your character moving in no time.

godot4shaderscourse_craftstunningvisuals.human_name: Godot 4 Shaders Course: Craft Stunning Visuals
godot4shaderscourse_craftstunningvisuals.description_text:
Ever wondered how to make visuals that keep players’ eyes glued to the screen?

The secret sauce is Shaders and we’re here to help you pour it all over your game!

We'll take you from ""What’s a shader?"" to ""Check out this cool visual effect I made!"" in no time.

Jumpstart your journey with programming in Godot’s own shading language, moving swiftly from the basics to the cooler, more complex spells of the shader world.

Discover the magic behind fragment and vertex shaders in both 2D and 3D, and get hands-on with techniques that'll make your game scenes pop like never before.

This course is perfect if you’re familiar with Godot basics but itching to elevate your games from great to ""Whoa, how did you do that?!""

With just a sprinkle of Godot basics and a dash of enthusiasm, you're set to create something visually unforgettable.

Grab the bundle now, your future games will thank you – and so will your players.

godot4cactionadventurecourse_buildyourow.human_name: Godot 4 C# Action Adventure Course: Build your own 2.5D RPG
godot4cactionadventurecourse_buildyourow.description_text:
Ready to conquer the 2.5D RPG realm and forge your adventure with Godot 4 & C#?

You'll build a classic dungeon RPG, blending 2D and 3D graphics, where your hero battles against smart enemies, uses bomb attacks, and unleashes combo attacks with lightning strikes!

Learn to craft pixel-perfect UIs using Godot’s control nodes and give your game a polished look with shaders and particle systems.

Dive deep into Godot's APIs, mastering everything from physics to scalable game architecture.

Get hands-on experience in building a fully-featured RPG, complete with combat systems, abilities, and immersive UIs, while also mastering the art of scalable and maintainable code.

Whether you’re a C# developer venturing into game creation, an RPG enthusiast dreaming of your own title, or simply looking to get it right the first time with clean, efficient code, this is the course for you!

Join us to forge your own epic RPG in Godot 4 now!

godot4_createandmastercustompluginscours.human_name: Godot 4: Create and Master Custom Plugins Course
godot4_createandmastercustompluginscours.description_text:
Ever wished Godot just did that one thing you need?

Time to stop wishing and start plugin-ing!

This course shows you how to install, build, and submit your very own custom Godot plugins—no wizard robe required.

Snap nodes into place, control selections from scripts like a boss, and make your tools feel right at home in the editor.

You’ll even hook into the undo-redo system like it’s NBD. Hands-on, practical, and packed with aha! moments.

Whether you’re fixing your workflow or flexing your dev muscles, this one’s a game-changer.

Grab the bundle now and start bending Godot to your will.

completegodot3dcourse_developyourown3dga.human_name: Complete Godot 3D Course: Develop Your Own 3D Games Using Godot 4
completegodot3dcourse_developyourown3dga.description_text:
Jump into the thrilling world of 3D game development with this fun, online course using Godot 4 and GDScript!

Explore the essentials of Godot 4 by creating cool 3D video games, from building immersive levels and environments to animating with Tweens, AnimationPlayers, and Shaders.

You’ll create 3 spectacular games in Godot 4…

Project Boost: a rocket adventure exploring physics and level navigation.

Barbarian Blaster: a Tower Defence game where you’ll learn essential skills like firing projectiles, dealing damage, spawning game objects, making animations and more.

Robo Rampage: First Person Shooter game where you’ll build custom interior levels, enemies with AI and hone your 3D game dev skills.

Whether you’re a complete beginner or have dabbled in Godot before, this course has something for you.

Godot 4 is an amazing engine and this course is the perfect place to dive into it!

completegodot2dcourse_developyourown2dga.human_name: Complete Godot 2D Course: Develop Your Own 2D Games Using Godot 4
completegodot2dcourse_developyourown2dga.description_text:
Learn how to create 2D games from start to finish in Godot engine 4 and GDScript!

Get hands-on with Godot 4, and create 3 exciting games:

Speed Saucer, a Collision Avoidance Game where you’ll learn Godot fundamentals.

Alien Attack, a 2D Side Scrolling Space Shooter Game full of UI tricks and particle effects and more!

Martian Mike, a fun platformer that teaches you about animations and scene management.

We take you through the fundamentals and key concepts of Godot. You’ll use Godot’s built-in scripting language, GDScript, to create interesting game mechanics.

Plus, you’ll learn the fundamentals of programming such as if statements, loops, functions, coroutines, and more.

Perfect for beginners or those with some Godot experience, this course is your fun gateway to mastering Godot 4's new features like Tilemap and animation tools.

So snag the bundle and let’s dive into it!

oceana.description_text:
Donations to support Oceana are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Oceana is the largest international advocacy organization dedicated solely to ocean conservation. Oceana is rebuilding abundant and biodiverse oceans by winning science-based policies in countries that control one-third of the world’s wild fish catch. With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

godot4_builda2daction-adventuregamecours.human_name: Godot 4: Build a 2D Action-Adventure Game Course
godot4_builda2daction-adventuregamecours.description_text:
Ever dreamt of making your own 2D action-adventure game?

You’ll build one from scratch in Godot 4—puzzles, combat, dialogue, and all.

Master GDScript so you can make slimes attack, switches unlock secrets, and NPCs drop cryptic (or snarky) hints.

Craft a full world using tilemaps, terrains, and hidden treasure rooms.

Build puzzles with pressure plates and moveable blocks, and make enemies that actually put up a fight.

We go from blank project to fully playable game—no half-baked demos here.

Perfect for beginners or anyone switching to Godot and ready to dive in headfirst.

Grab the bundle now and start building the epic adventure that’s been living in your head.

godot4_buildanactioncombatrpgcourse.human_name: Godot 4: Build an Action Combat RPG Course
godot4_buildanactioncombatrpgcourse.description_text:
Ready to build a 3D RPG where your hero levels up, equips epic gear, and smashes baddies in style?

In this course, you’ll create characters with stats, gear that changes how they look and fight, and combat animations that feel oh-so-satisfying.

Learn to light up your game world with global illumination and craft UIs that actually make sense.

Build systems for levelling, inventory, stat boosts, and gear-swapping that’ll have players hooked.

We’ll even cover smart scripting tricks to keep your code clean and your gameplay tight.

Perfect if you’ve got some Godot 3D know-how and want to go full RPG dev mode.

Pick up the bundle now and bring your dream game world to life—XP grind optional.

oceana.description_text:
Donations to support Oceana are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Oceana is the largest international advocacy organization dedicated solely to ocean conservation. Oceana is rebuilding abundant and biodiverse oceans by winning science-based policies in countries that control one-third of the world’s wild fish catch. With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Become your office’s Microsoft Suite whiz—or simply sharpen your skills for fun—with the all-new Data Visualization Bundle from O’Reilly. Improve your productivity, increase your work speed, and collaborate more effectively with your team using the valuable tools in our latest bundle. Sit down and learn from professional-quality courses like Data Visualization with Microsoft Power BI, Excel Cookbook, ColorWise, and more. Plus, your purchase helps support Code for America!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Imagine limitless possibilities in data visualization
basic_data.description:
Imagine limitless possibilities in data visualization. Become your office’s Microsoft Suite whiz—or simply sharpen your skills for fun—with the all-new Data Visualization Bundle from O’Reilly. Improve your productivity, increase your work speed, and collaborate more effectively with your team using the valuable tools in our latest bundle.
