buildingcliapplicationswithcandnet.human_name: Building CLI Applications with C# and .NET
buildingcliapplicationswithcandnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Receive expert guidance on building CLI applications with .NET
  • Implement advanced techniques for creating cross-platform, modular, and robust CLI applications
  • Put your knowledge into practice through hands-on exercises and real-world projects
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for software developers, architects, and DevOps engineers aiming to enhance their existing SaaS platforms or optimize system operations. It focuses on providing users with CLI applications that automate and streamline workflows, unlocking operational efficiency. A basic understanding of programming concepts and prior experience with .NET and C# is expected, as this book doesn't cover introductory material.

blazorwebdevelopmentcookbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Develop generic, customizable components secured with roles and policies
  • Manage application and user states, in simple to complex scenarios, across render boundaries
  • Enhance user experience by embedding AI-powered features into the application
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for developers with a foundational understanding of Blazor and .NET seeking proven solutions to common web application development challenges. Frontend engineers, .NET developers, and solution architects looking to gain full-stack expertise will also find this resource invaluable. Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript programming will help you get the most out of this web development book.

pragmaticmicroserviceswithcandazure.human_name: Pragmatic Microservices with C# and Azure
pragmaticmicroserviceswithcandazure.description_text:
Key Features

  • Benefit from step-by-step project-based guidance on how to develop a full-fledged microservices application
  • Gain extensive knowledge of microservices by covering essential concepts, tools, and methodologies
  • Use essential Microsoft Azure cloud-native services and as alternatives for on-premises environments
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for software developers, architects, and engineers who are interested in adopting microservices architecture using the .NET framework and Microsoft Azure. Both intermediate and advanced developers who have a foundational understanding of C#, ASP.NET Core, and cloud computing concepts will find this book helpful.

systemsprogrammingwithcandnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Engage in hands-on exercises to effectively apply systems programming concepts
  • Gain insights into Linux and embedded systems and broaden your development capabilities
  • Learn how to deploy and maintain applications securely in diverse production environments
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for C# developers and programmers looking to deepen their expertise in systems programming with .NET Core. Professionals aspiring to architect high-performance applications, system engineers, and those involved in deploying and maintaining applications in production environments will also find this book useful. A basic understanding of C# and .NET Core is recommended, making it suitable for developers who are getting started with systems programming in C# and .NET Core.

aspnetcore9essentials.description_text:
Key Features

  • Create robust, web-based solutions optimized for continuous delivery using key cloud computing principles and practices
  • Explore advanced concepts and techniques to create resilient and secure applications
  • Adopt a cloud-native mindset to build applications leveraging Docker, CI/CD, and more
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for web developers and software engineers who want to build modern web applications using ASP.NET Core. It’s ideal for those working on both frontend and backend development. If you're familiar with C# or Java, and have basic experience with HTML and CSS, you'll benefit the most. Whether you're a beginner exploring ASP.NET Core or an experienced developer looking to advance your skills, this book is tailored for you.

architectingaspnetcoreapplications.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn multiple ways to organize your application code and become a more flexible ASP.NET Core developer
  • Explore hands-on design patterns, learn architectural principles, and how to sidestep anti-patterns
  • Refactor code toward modern application design, such as feature-based vertical slice and clean architecture

Who this book is for

This book is for intermediate-level ASP.NET Core developers who want to improve their C# app code structure and API design skills. ASP.NET developers who want to modernize their knowledge and enhance their technical architecture skills will also like this book. It’s also a good refresher for those in software design roles with more experience looking to update their expertise.

A good knowledge of C# programming and a basic understanding of web concepts is necessary to get the most out of this book, though some refreshers are included along the way.

programmingapiswithcandnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn API design principles and architecture for high-performance applications
  • Develop robust APIs using best practices for security, scalability, and maintainability
  • Implement both traditional and minimal APIs with real-world scenarios
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for .NET developers, software engineers, and backend developers looking to master API development using C# and ASP.NET Core. It caters to those with a basic understanding of C# and familiarity with the .NET ecosystem. Even though no prior experience with API frameworks is required, knowledge of ASP.NET Core will be helpful.

toolsandskillsfornet8.description_text:
Key Features

  • Coverage of key .NET tools and skills including refactoring, source code management, debugging, memory troubleshooting, and more
  • Practical guidance on using code editors effectively, implementing best practices, and protecting data
  • Explore cutting-edge techniques like building intelligent apps, cloud native development with .NET Aspire, and Docker containerization

Who this book is for

.NET professionals seeking to enhance their expertise, as well as aspiring developers aiming to advance their careers in the field. This book caters to individuals eager to master essential .NET tools, refine their development practices, explore advanced techniques and cutting-edge tools, and prepare themselves for job opportunities and interviews in the competitive landscape of .NET development

webdevelopmentwithblazor.description_text:
Key Features

  • Create a production-ready Blazor application from start to finish
  • Find out how, when, and why to use Blazor Server and Blazor WebAssembly, as well as Blazor Hybrid
  • Explore crucial new coverage of streaming rendering, server-side rendering (SSR), flexible hosting models, and Blazor templates

Who this book is for

This book is for .NET web developers and software developers who want to use their existing C# skills to build interactive web applications running either inside the web browser using Blazor WebAssembly, on the server using Blazor Server, or a combination of the two.

You'll need basic knowledge of C# and prior exposure to .NET web development before you get started; the book will guide you through the rest.

candalgorithmicthinkingforthecompletebeg.human_name: C# and Algorithmic Thinking for the Complete Beginner
candalgorithmicthinkingforthecompletebeg.description_text:
Key Features

  • Comprehensive introduction to C# and algorithmic thinking with step-by-step guidance.
  • Practical exercises with real-world applications, along with integration of Visual Studio Code.
  • Detailed explanations and tips for mastering complex topics.

Who this book is for

This course is ideal for complete beginners with no prior programming experience. It caters to students just entering the field of computer science, hobbyists interested in exploring programming as a new pastime, and professionals from non-technical backgrounds aiming to transition into tech roles. Educators can use it as a structured teaching resource, while parents can support their children's coding interests. With basic familiarity with computers recommended but not required, this course opens the door to gain foundational knowledge in C# programming and algorithmic thinking.

softwarearchitecturewithc12andnet8.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get introduced to software architecture fundamentals and begin applying them in .NET
  • Explore the main technologies used by software architects and choose the best ones for your needs
  • Master new developments in .NET with the help of a practical case study that looks at software architecture for a travel agency

Who this book is for

This book is for engineers and senior software developers aspiring to become architects or looking to build enterprise applications with the .NET stack.

Basic familiarity with C# and .NET is required to get the most out of this software architecture book.

real-worldwebdevelopmentwithnet9.description_text:
Key Features

  • Master ASP.NET Core MVC, Web API, and OData for building robust web services.
  • Get hands-on experience with web testing, security, and containerization techniques.
  • Learn how to implement Umbraco CMS for content management websites.

Who this book is for

This book is aimed at intermediate .NET developers with a good understanding of C# and .NET fundamentals. It is ideal for developers looking to expand their skills in building professional, controller-based web applications.

minimalapisinaspnet9.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get to grips with API design, architecture, and development methodologies to create elegant and scalable APIs in .NET
  • Get insights into contemporary trends and tools shaping the API industry
  • Explore both basic and advanced topics such as optimization, data integration, and caching
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

If you’re a generalist developer looking for a fresh perspective on API development with an emphasis on minimalism, then this book is for you. Aimed at intermediate developers, this book strikes the right balance between accessibility and depth. The book assumes an intermediate level of C# and .NET knowledge, while providing sufficient guidance and explanations to help you progress confidently through the chapters.

c13andnet9_moderncross-platformdevelopme.human_name: C# 13 and .NET 9 - Modern Cross-Platform Development Fundamentals
c13andnet9_moderncross-platformdevelopme.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore the newest additions to C# 13, the .NET 9 class libraries, and Entity Framework Core 9
  • Build professional websites and services with ASP.NET Core 9 and Blazor
  • Enhance your skills with step-by-step code examples and best practices tips

Who this book is for

This book is aimed at beginner to intermediate-level C# and .NET developers. While prior exposure to C# or .NET is not a prerequisite, a general understanding of programming concepts will be beneficial.

If you want to learn more technologies for building modern .NET projects like gRPC, SignalR, and .NET MAUI, read Mark's Apps and Services with .NET 8 book next; and if you aim to become a professional .NET developer quickly or mainly work on team projects, read his other book, Tools and Skills for .NET 8.

cdatastructuresandalgorithms_secondediti.description_text:
Key Features

  • Master lists, stacks, queues, dictionaries, sets, and trees, among other data structures
  • Delve into effective design and implementation techniques to meet your software requirements
  • Visualize data structures and algorithms through illustrations for a clearer understanding of their analysis
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for developers looking to learn data structures and algorithms in C#. While basic programming skills and C# knowledge is useful, beginners will find value in the provided code snippets, illustrations, and detailed explanations, enhancing their programming skills. Advanced developers can use this book as a valuable resource for reusable code snippets, instead of writing algorithms from scratch each time.

netmauicookbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Follow step-by-step recipes with best practices for a performant UI and structured business logic
  • Perform essential modern tasks like integration with Web API, Google OAuth, SignalR, and AI
  • Check out additional sections for deep understanding, common pitfalls, and GitHub examples
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for intermediate developers familiar with .NET MAUI basics, and is perfect for those looking to deepen their understanding and refine their skills for creating cross-platform applications and delivering top-quality applications. The book offers advanced techniques and practical examples for handling real-world development challenges effectively.

cinterviewguide.description_text:
Key Features

  • Acquire a strong foundation in syntax, data types, and object-oriented programming to code confidently
  • Develop strategies for addressing behavioral questions, tackle technical challenges, and showcase your coding skills
  • Augment your C# programming skills with valuable insights from industry experts
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for individuals aspiring to pursue a career in C# programming or software development. Whether you are a beginner or experienced professional, this guide will enhance your technical interview skills and C# programming knowledge.

modernfull-stackwebdevelopmentwithaspnet.human_name: Modern Full-Stack Web Development with ASP.NET Core
modernfull-stackwebdevelopmentwithaspnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Integrate Angular, Vue.js, and React frameworks into ASP.NET Core projects following frontend development best practices
  • Use ASP.NET Core to its full potential to create a versatile backend layer based on RESTful APIs
  • Secure your application against threats and vulnerabilities in a time-efficient way
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for beginners in web development and anyone looking to build a strong foundation in ASP.NET Core, as well as gain essential knowledge of JavaScript frameworks like Angular, React, and Vue.js. Whether you’re new to web development or have some experience, this book offers a project-based, hands-on approach to mastering ASP.NET Core as the backbone of full-stack applications. Alongside ASP.NET Core, you’ll develop basic skills in modern JavaScript frameworks and learn to integrate them effectively to build dynamic, robust web applications from the ground up.

enterprisearchitecturewithnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn the principles of business-aligned software architecture
  • Relate theory to several well-known architecture frameworks
  • Apply the knowledge you gain to create a .NET application with a standard-based API
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for software architects who want to have an in-depth understanding of how their applications will be used and how they can fight technical debt as well as design software to keep it working even when business requirements evolve. If your previous software designs experienced progressive loss of performance and the capacity to evolve, this book is for you.

effectivenetmemorymanagement.description_text:
Key Features

  • Discover tools and strategies to build efficient, scalable applications
  • Implement .NET memory management techniques to effectively boost your application’s performance
  • Uncover practical methods for troubleshooting memory leaks and diagnosing performance bottlenecks
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for developers and professionals who are beyond the beginner stage and seek in-depth knowledge of memory management techniques within the context of .NET Core. Whether you are an experienced developer aiming to enhance application performance or an architect striving for optimal resource utilization, this book serves as a comprehensive guide to mastering memory management intricacies. To fully benefit from this book, you should have a solid understanding of C# programming and familiarity with the basics of .NET Core development.

appsandserviceswithnet8.description_text:
Key Features

  • Use specialized libraries to improve all aspects of your apps, including performance, security, and localization
  • Harness the full potential of .NET using cloud-native data stores like Cosmos DB, and unlock scalability, performance, and resilience in your service implementations
  • Unleash the capabilities of Blazor Full Stack and.NET MAUI to develop stunning, truly cross-platform apps for web and mobile

Who this book is for

This book is for .NET developers interested in exploring more specialized libraries and implementation fundamentals behind building services and apps.

You’ll need to know your way around .NET and C# quite well before you can dive in, so if you want to work your way up to this book, you can pick up Mark’s other .NET book, C# 12 and .NET 8 – Modern Cross-Platform Development Fundamentals, first.

webapidevelopmentwithaspnetcore8.human_name: Web API Development with ASP.NET Core 8
webapidevelopmentwithaspnetcore8.description_text:
Key Features

  • Gain proficiency in building modern ASP.NET Core web API applications
  • Develop the skills to effectively test, debug, and secure your web API applications
  • Streamline development workflows and boost productivity with cloud computing platforms and industry-standard CI/CD tools
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for developers who want to learn how to build web APIs with ASP.NET Core and create flexible, maintainable, scalable applications with .NET platform. Basic knowledge of C#, .NET, and Git will assist with understanding the concepts more easily.

30-hourwebdevelopmentvibecodingsuperbund.human_name: 30-HOUR Web Development Vibe Coding Super Bundle

Start your complete front-end development journey with this 30 HOUR video course bundle, from the very first HTML tag to advanced dashboards, bots, and automation workflows.

Inside, you’ll go from fundamentals to full-stack-level skills with tools that pros actually use, including a modern coding supertool: Cursor.

High-performance workflows in Cursor IDE with pro-level shortcuts and automations

next-levelexcelautomationpowerpackwithpy.human_name: Next-Level Excel Automation Power Pack with Python Vibe Coding
next-levelexcelautomationpowerpackwithpy.description_text:

That’s the magic of combining Python and models, and this bundle shows you exactly how to make it happen.

You’ll learn how to:

✅ Automate repetitive Excel tasks with Python scripts and prompts

✅ Transform messy data into clean, usable insights—fast

Say goodbye to manual drudgery—and hello to Excel mastery. Start the bundle today and take control of your data.

exceldatavisualizationin5hours_designint.human_name: Excel Data Visualization in 5 Hours - Design Interactive Charts for Deeper Analysis
exceldatavisualizationin5hours_designint.description_text:

In this 5-HOUR bundle, you'll discover how to create compelling, dynamic charts in Excel that turn data into clear, impactful insights.

Stop relying on default visuals. Start building interactive dashboards and custom visuals that help you explain trends, compare values, and support smarter decisions.

What you’ll explore along the way:

  • Crafting charts that update automatically as data changes
  • Choosing the right chart type for your analysis goals
  • Highlighting key trends and outliers with smart formatting
  • Creating visuals that are clean, professional, and presentation-ready

You don’t need to be a developer to build powerful data tools. This bundle gives you the skills to streamline reporting, unlock insights, and deliver value—fast.

Includes lifetime access and downloadable source files for every project.

Get started today and transform the way you work with data.

microsoftofficespecialistmosmastercertif.human_name: Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) Master Certification with 10 Practice Exams
microsoftofficespecialistmosmastercertif.description_text:
Ready to level up your career with serious Office power? For the first time ever on Humble Bundle, unlock the full potential of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook with the Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) Master Certification Bundle—complete with 10 full practice exams to help you ace the tests and stand out.

Whether you're aiming for your first job, climbing the corporate ladder, or boosting your freelance game, this bundle gives you everything you need to master Microsoft Office—the world’s #1 productivity suite.

Learn real-world workflows, polish your pro skills, and gain the confidence to earn industry-recognized certification in, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook.

Whether you're studying, dreaming of a better job, or entrepreneur-ing, this certification proves you’ve got the digital skills to thrive in any environment.

This exclusive MOS Master Certification bundle is only available for a limited time on Humble Bundle. Start building your future today—one spreadsheet, presentation, and polished resume at a time.

childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.description_text:
Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

pythonbusinessproductivityagentdevelopme.description_text:

Learn how to create tools that think, respond, and get things done—without you hovering over every step.

✅ Automate real-world tasks across sales, marketing, and operations

✅ Build smart, reusable tools for your own business or freelance clients

✅ Create responsive agents that handle documents, data, and user input

You’ll combine services like Make.com, Google Workspace, and more to design workflows that run on autopilot—handling everything from email responses to data processing and lead follow-ups.

No fluff. No filler. Just clear, real-world use cases that save time and scale output.

Comes with lifetime access and downloadable project files. Build once. Reuse forever. Tweak as you grow.

If you’re ready to go from task-doer to tool-builder, this is your starting line.

exclusiveautomationbusinessandmonetizati.human_name: Exclusive Automation Business and Monetization Strategies with Make.com
exclusiveautomationbusinessandmonetizati.description_text:
Turn your automations into income.

This course is your blueprint for building a real business with Make.com—not just running workflows, but monetizing them at scale.

You won’t just learn how to connect apps. You’ll learn how to:

– Package automations as sellable services

– Build solutions clients will pay for

– Create recurring revenue from custom integrations

– Streamline operations so you can scale without extra overhead

– Offer automation consulting, SaaS-style tools, or internal systems with real ROI

Whether you're a freelancer, agency, or entrepreneur, you'll explore proven strategies that blend automation, business building, and smart systems thinking.

You’ll also see real use cases—from client onboarding flows to automated reporting engines—and get inspiration for your own monetized Make.com services.

Includes lifetime access and downloadable templates and workflows to customize and launch right away.

Automate smarter. Sell the systems.

Build a business that runs—even when you’re not.

Let’s start.

makecomforcontentcreationandmarketing.human_name: Make.com for Content Creation and Marketing
makecomforcontentcreationandmarketing.description_text:
Create more. Market smarter. Automate the rest.

This course shows you how to use Make.com to streamline your entire content and marketing workflow—from planning and production to publishing and promotion.

Whether you're a solo creator, part of a content team, or running digital campaigns, you’ll learn how to:

Automate content calendars, idea tracking, and social post scheduling

️ Connect your favorite tools—Google Docs, Airtable, Notion, Trello, and more

Automatically distribute content across platforms and channels

Capture performance data and generate easy-to-read reports

Save time with repeatable workflows for blogs, newsletters, videos, and beyond

You’ll go from copy/paste chaos to a clean, scalable system that works behind the scenes—so you can focus on content that actually moves the needle.

Includes lifetime access and downloadable templates for every workflow.

Build once. Reuse forever. Start now.

datascienceandanalyticswithmakecom.human_name: Data Science and Analytics with Make.com
datascienceandanalyticswithmakecom.description_text:
With Make.com, you can build automated data pipelines that not only collect information—but interpret it, analyze it, and help you make better decisions in real time. Learn how to bring data science workflows into your automation toolkit—no manual modeling or complex setup required.

Automate sentiment analysis to track customer feedback and brand tone

Integrate BigML seamlessly with Make.com for scalable, no-code modeling

You’ll go beyond dashboards—this is about building workflows that think, analyze, and deliver decisions on demand.

Perfect for analysts, marketers, product teams, and decision-makers who want to:

Automate insight generation

Reduce analysis time

Build smarter, faster, data-powered workflows

Includes hands-on Make.com blueprints, guided builds, and use-case walkthroughs tailored for business impact.

Let your data do the work—starting now.

Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

basic_data.human_name: Humble Book Bundle: The Essential Star Wars Insider Collection
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Since 1987, Star Wars Insider has been the definitive source for all things Star Wars and we’re pleased to offer our members exclusive access to The Essential Star Wars Insider Collection! Go behind-the-scenes of your favorite Star Wars movies and TV shows--including all three trilogies and the standalone films Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and Solo: A Star Wars Story--and TV epics including The Clone Wars and The Mandalorian. These volumes are packed with cast and crew interviews, concept art and photography from the Lucasfilm Archives. There's even fiction from the first phase of The High Republic publishing initiative, written by New York Times bestselling authors Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, and Charles Soule. This bundle is your essential companion to nearly 50 years of Star Wars. Become one with The Force and help support First Book with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: The definitive Star Wars publication bundle.
basic_data.description:
The definitive Star Wars publication bundle. Since 1987, Star Wars Insider has been the definitive source for all things Star Wars and we’re pleased to offer our members exclusive access to The Essential Star Wars Insider Collection! Go behind-the-scenes of your favorite Star Wars movies and TV shows--including all three trilogies and the standalone films Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and Solo: A Star Wars Story--and TV epics including The Clone Wars and The Mandalorian. These volumes are packed with cast and crew interviews, concept art and photography from the Lucasfilm Archives. There's even fiction from the first phase of The High Republic publishing initiative, written by New York Times bestselling authors Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, and Charles Soule. This bundle is your essential companion to nearly 50 years of Star Wars. Become one with The Force and help support First Book with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $784. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are redeemable on the Kobo.com website. Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support First Book. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

riseofskywalker_theofficialcollectorsedt.human_name: The Rise of Skywalker: The Official Collector's Edtion
riseofskywalker_theofficialcollectorsedt.description_text: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Official Collector’s Edition features stunning photography, breathtaking concept art, and exclusive profiles of the heroes, villains, droids, and ships of the heroic forces of the Resistance and the sinister First Order. Interviews with the cast of the blockbuster film, including Daisy Ridley (Rey), John Boyega (Finn), Oscar Isaac (Poe Dameron), and Adam Driver (Kylo Ren) make this an essential volume for all Star Wars fans.

starwars_themandalorianguidetoseason1.human_name: Star Wars: The Mandalorian Guide to Season One
starwars_themandalorianguidetoseason1.description_text:
This deluxe collector’s edition explores the debut season of the first live action Star Wars television series – Star Wars: The Mandalorian.

Join us as the Mandalorian, a ruthless bounty hunter, and the Child, his tiny companion, navigate a galaxy of rogues and smugglers at the heart of the critically-acclaimed Disney+ series.

With never-before-seen photographs, a complete episode guide, and a detailed behind-the-scenes look at how the show – and its iconic new characters such as IG-11, Cara Dune, and Moff Gideon – came to life, Star Wars: The Mandalorian: Guide to Season One is the indispensable volume for all Star Wars fans.

firstbook.description_text:
Donations to support First Book are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

First Book is a nonprofit social enterprise that provides new books and educational resources to programs and schools serving children in need. By making new, high-quality books and resources available on an ongoing basis, First Book is transforming the lives of children in need and elevating the quality of education. For more information, visit www.firstbook.org.

Over 30 million American kids live in poverty. First Book wants to see every single one of them read, learn and succeed. A nonprofit social enterprise, First Book makes new, high-quality books available to schools and programs serving children from low-income families. More than 120,000 educators and program leaders have joined First Book to access outstanding educational resources for free or deeply reduced prices. Together we can reach every child, every classroom and every community. Learn more about how you can support kids in need at www.firstbook.org.

empirestrikesback40thanniversaryspecial.human_name: The Empire Strikes Back 40th Anniversary Special
empirestrikesback40thanniversaryspecial.description_text:
“Luke Skywalker and Han Solo rescued the Princess and destroyed the Death Star but their story didn’t end there.” – Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, Theatrical Trailer, 1979

Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: The 40th Anniversary Special explores the myths, legends, and reality behind the critical box-office smash hit that has been a fan-favorite since its release in 1980.

Learn how iconic sequences, such as the battle of Hoth, the Millennium Falcon’s pursuit through the asteroid field, and Luke Skywalker’s epic duel with Darth Vader in Cloud City, were brought from script to screen.

Featuring on-set interviews with the cast and crew, fun facts, production photos, and original concept art, this official special edition goes in depth to explore the classic movie.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume11_alienscrea.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 11: Aliens, Creatures and Droids
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume11_alienscrea.description_text:
Star Wars: Aliens, Creatures, and Droids celebrates the Star Wars saga’s non-human, but occasionally humanoid, characters.

This collection includes classic interviews with Anthony Daniels (C-3PO), Kenny Baker (R2-D2), Warwick Davis (Wicket), Matthew Wood (General Grievous) and acclaimed writer Paul Dini (the Ewoks animated series).

Also included are interviews with the men behind BB-8, an in-depth look at the creation of R2-D2, essential trivia and rarely seen images featuring some of the Star Wars saga’s strangest beings.

returnofthejedi.human_name: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: The 40th Anniversary Special Edition
returnofthejedi.description_text:
Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: The 40th Anniversary Special Edition honors the critically-acclaimed box-office smash hit that marked the closing chapter of the original Star Wars trilogy.

Go behind-the-scenes to visit Jabba the Hutt’s seamy court, the Forest Moon of Endor, and the second Death Star, and learn how the story of Luke Skywalker’s final confrontation with Darth Vader was created.

Featuring on-set interviews with the cast and crew, production photos, and original concept art, this deluxe special edition goes in-depth to explore the classic movie.

starwars_anewhopeofficialcelebrationspec.human_name: Star Wars: A New Hope Official Celebration Special Book
starwars_anewhopeofficialcelebrationspec.description_text:
A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away…

Star Wars: A New Hope: The Official Celebration Special pays tribute to the 1977 movie that started the Star Wars franchise.

Discover how George Lucas created an epic story that has enthralled generation after generation for 40 years, and learn how the worlds, aliens and droids made the journey from the mind of a very independent filmmaker to become icons of popular culture.

starwars_theclonewars_theofficialcollect.human_name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: The Official Collector's Edition
starwars_theclonewars_theofficialcollect.description_text:
“Star Wars: The Clone Wars is exactly like the Star Wars movies… It’s basically a dramatic series: there’s lots of action and humor.” – George Lucas.

Over the course of seven seasons and a movie, the Emmy award-winning Star Wars: The Clone Wars expands on the Skywalker saga to tell the story of the epic conflict between the loyal Republic clone troopers and the relentless droid army of the Separatists.

This deluxe collector’s edition includes an in-depth guide to every episode of the critically acclaimed series, stunning original concept art, and behind-the-scenes interviews with supervising director Dave Filloni and his team as they discuss how they brought the groundbreaking adventures of Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, and Obi-Wan Kenobi to life.

starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.human_name: Star Wars Insider Presents: The Mandalorian Season Two Volume 2
starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.description_text: Journey to amazing worlds as Star Wars: The Mandalorian, the critically acclaimed series that expands the Star Wars galaxy, continues to tell the story of the Mandalorian warrior Din Djarin and Grogu. This deluxe edition collects stunning artwork from chapters 9-12, featuring the battles, creatures, and worlds as seen in the hit series.

starwars_themandalorianguidetoseason2.human_name: Star Wars The Mandalorian Guide To Season Two
starwars_themandalorianguidetoseason2.description_text:
This deluxe collector’s edition explores the award-winning second season of Star Wars: The Mandalorian.

Learn more about the adventures of the Mandalorian and his tiny companion, Grogu, as they join forces with new allies, including Ahsoka Tano, Boba Fett, and Luke Skywalker in the critically-acclaimed Disney+ series.

With a guide to every episode, never-before-seen photographs, stunning art, and an in-depth look at how the groundbreaking season was created, Star Wars: The Mandalorian: Guide to Season Two is the essential volume for all Star Wars fans.

starwars_thegalaxysgreatestvillains.human_name: Star Wars: The Galaxy's Greatest Villains
starwars_thegalaxysgreatestvillains.description_text:
The villains of Star Wars have terrified audiences for over 40 years as they have fought against all that is good in the galaxy far, far away.

This lavishly illustrated volume includes classic interviews with the key players behind the characters, including Ian McDiarmid (Palpatine), Ray Park (Darth Maul), Jeremy Bulloch (Boba Fett), Peter Cushing (Grand Moff Tarkin), Christopher Lee (Count Dooku), and David Prowse and James Earl Jones (Darth Vader), along with the creators who have brought George Lucas’ epic vision to life.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume5_lordsofthes.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 5: Lords of The Sith
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume5_lordsofthes.description_text:
They are the warriors whose thirst for power is matched only by their ruthlessness, but who are the Sith Lords?

From the opening moments of A New Hope in which the imposing figure of Darth Vader strode onto the Tantive IV – and into movie history – to Kylo Ren’s memorable debut in Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the Sith have proved that bad guys have all the fun.

This collection includes interviews with the actors who brought the Sith to life such as Ian McDiarmid (Emperor Palpatine/Darth Sidious), Hayden Christensen (Anakin Skywalker), and Christopher Lee (Count Dooku), along with articles that explore these evil practitioners of the dark side.

starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.human_name: Star Wars Insider Presents: The Mandalorian Season Two Volume 1
starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.description_text: Journey to amazing worlds as Star Wars: The Mandalorian, the critically acclaimed series that expands the Star Wars universe, continues to tell the story of the Mandalorian warrior Din Djarin and the Child. This deluxe edition collects stunning artwork from chapters 9-12, featuring the battles, creatures, and worlds as seen in the hit series.

starwars_thelastjeditheultimateguide.human_name: Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Ultimate Guide
starwars_thelastjeditheultimateguide.description_text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Ultimate Guide includes profiles of the heroes, villains, droids, and ships of the heroic forces of the Resistance and the sinister First Order. Stunning photography and concept art combine to make this an essential volume for all fans of the Star Wars saga.

starwars_thegalaxysgreatestheroes.human_name: Star Wars: The Galaxy's Greatest Heroes
starwars_thegalaxysgreatestheroes.description_text:
The heroes of the Star Wars have inspired audiences for over 40 years as they have battled tyranny, injustice and evil.

This lavishly illustrated volume includes classic interviews with the key players behind the characters, Mark Hamill (Luke Skywalker), Carrie Fisher (Leia Organa), Harrison Ford (Han Solo), Daisy Ridley (Rey), John Boyega (Finn), Ashley Eckstein (Ahsoka Tano), and Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi), along with the filmmakers who have brought creator George Lucas’ epic vision to life.

starwars_theageofresistancetheofficialco.human_name: Star Wars: The Age of Resistance The Official Collector's Edition
starwars_theageofresistancetheofficialco.description_text:
The Force awakens in a young scavenger called Rey, who crosses the path of Kylo Ren, a mysterious practitioner of the dark side of the Force. Teaming up with a former stormtrooper, Finn, a resistance pilot, Poe Dameron, an astromech droid, BB-8, and the rest of the Resistance, Rey begins an epic journey. As she joins the fight against the sinister First Order, she meets the lost Jedi Master Luke Skywalker, and faces the returning menace of Emperor Palpatine.

Star Wars: Age of Resistance: The Official Collector’s Edition is the ultimate journey through the story of the three box-office phenomenon films that concluded the Skywalker saga. Jump to lightspeed with backstories of heroes and villains, interviews featuring the cast and crew, stunning photography and magnificent concept art.

starwars_theskywalkersagatheofficialcoll.human_name: Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga The Official Collector's Edition
starwars_theskywalkersagatheofficialcoll.description_text:
“A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…”

For more than four decades, the Skywalker saga has thrilled generations of fans who have grown up with one of the greatest stories in cinematic history.

This epic volume goes behind the scenes on the entire Skywalker saga from 1977’s Star Wars: A New Hope to 2019’s Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, including interviews with the principal cast and crew, and imagery culled from the Lucasfilm Image Archives. From George Lucas’ thoughts on the making of A New Hope, to Ewan McGregor stepping into the shoes of the late Sir Alec Guinness to play Obi-Wan Kenobi, to Daisy Ridley taking on the role of Rey in the final trilogy, this is a must for anyone touched by this incredible story.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume1.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 1
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume1.description_text:
Discover the secrets behind the most popular space fantasy of all time!

Exclusive interviews with the creators, cast and crew of the entire Star Wars saga. Amazing transcripts of creator George Lucas discussing the early days of the spin-off fiction and comics! Exclusive commentary on each interview. Rare images direct from the Lucasfilm Archives. The team responsible for the Emmy-award winning animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, reveals the story behind the hit show.

starwarsinsider_thehighrepublic_starligh.human_name: Star Wars: The High Republic: Starlight Stories
starwarsinsider_thehighrepublic_starligh.description_text:
5 original stories from the galactic frontier.

Step aboard the Starlight Beacon and join Administrator Velko Jahen, Chief Ghal Tarpfen, and Jedi from the High Republic Era as they face…

A mysterious assassination attempt… A strange distress call… A threat from the carnivorous Drengir… And more!

This special edition collects five, two-part short stories first presented in Star Wars Insider magazine.

Featuring tales by The New York Times bestselling authors Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, and Charles Soule, this deluxe collector’s edition also includes in-depth interviews exploring the creative process behind the series.

developers.developer-name: Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, Charles Soule

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume9_thebestofth.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 9: The Original Trilogy
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume9_thebestofth.description_text:
Star Wars: The Original Trilogy celebrates Episodes IV-VI of the Star Wars saga: A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi.

This collection includes classic interviews with Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Anthony Daniels, Billy Dee Williams, and profiles of actors Sir Alec Guinness and Harrison Ford.

Also included are in-depth examinations of key scenes, essential trivia and rarely seen images from the creation of the epic space fantasy that changed cinema forever.

starwars_rogueone_astarwarsstorytheoffic.human_name: Star Wars: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story The Official Mission Debrief
starwars_rogueone_astarwarsstorytheoffic.description_text: The Official Rogue One Mission Debrief presents an all-encompassing guide to the hugely successful movie, with unprecedented access to the making of the film, and in-depth interviews with cast and crew including Gareth Edwards, Kathleen Kennedy, Felicity Jones, Forest Whitaker and more. Relive the latest movie in the world’s biggest franchise over and over again.

starwars_soloastarwarsstoryultimateguide.human_name: Solo A Star Wars Story: The Ultimate Guide
starwars_soloastarwarsstoryultimateguide.description_text:
Solo: A Star Wars Story: The Ultimate Guide is a unique collection of interviews and profiles with Alden Ehrenreich (Han Solo), Donald Glover (Lando Calrissian), Emilia Clarke (Qi’ra), and director Ron Howard.

Authors Jonathan and Lawrence Kasdan discuss writing the movie, creature designer Neal Scanlon showcases some of his wildest creatures, plus there is an exploration of the Millennium Falcon.

starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.human_name: Star Wars Insider Presents: The Mandalorian Season One Volume 1
starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.description_text:
Explore the amazing world of Star Wars: The Mandalorian, the critically acclaimed series that expands the Star Wars galaxy to incredible new frontiers. This deluxe edition collects the stunning artwork from the first four chapters of the Disney+ smash hit, showcasing the characters, costumes, creatures, and environments of this all-new Star Wars story.

Featuring the work of world-renowned and fan favorite artists Doug Chiang, Christian Alzmann, Ryan Church, Nick Gindraux, John Park, Jama Jurabaev, Erik Tiemens, Brian Matyas, Seth Engstrom, and Anton Grandert.

starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.human_name: Star Wars Insider Presents: The Mandalorian Season One Volume 2
starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianse.description_text: Journey to amazing worlds as Star Wars: The Mandalorian, the critically acclaimed series that expands the Star Wars universe, continues to tell the acclaimed story of the mysterious Mandalorian warrior Din Djarin and the Child. This deluxe edition collects the stunning artwork from chapters 5-8, featuring the droids, rogues, and soldiers of the Empire as seen in the hit series.

starwarsinsider_thehighrepublic_talesofe.human_name: Star Wars: The High Republic: Tales of Enlightenment
starwarsinsider_thehighrepublic_talesofe.description_text:
Six original stories from a more civilized age.

Step into Enlightenment, a tapbar located in Jedha City, where every patron has a story to tell.

This special edition collects five short stories first presented in Star Wars Insider magazine, along with an exclusive bonus story, “Missing Pieces.”

Featuring tales by The Sunday Times bestselling author George Mann, this deluxe collector’s edition also includes interviews with the writing team exploring the creative process behind the second phase of adventures.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume10_roguesscou.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 10: Rogues, Scoundrels and Bounty Hunters
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume10_roguesscou.description_text:
Star Wars: Rogues, Scoundrels, and Bounty Hunters celebrates the Star Wars saga’s characters who exist in the shady underworld between the rebels and the Empire.

This collection includes classic interviews with Harrison Ford (Han Solo), Jeremy Bulloch (Boba Fett), Peter Mayhew (Chewbacca), and the creative teams behind projects such as Shadows of the Empire and Marvel’s acclaimed Doctor Aphra comic book series.

Also included are in-depth examinations of key scenes, essential trivia and rarely seen images from the fringes of the Star Wars galaxy.

starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianco.human_name: Star Wars Insider Presents: The Mandalorian Collection
starwarsinsiderpresents_themandalorianco.description_text: Explore the Mandalorians as seen throughout Star Wars storytelling, from Jango and Boba Fett to Din Djarin and Bo-Katan Kryze. This deluxe edition provides an exploration of popular Mandalorian characters from film, television, and more with interviews with Pedro Pascal (Din Djarin), Temuera Morrison (Jango/Boba Fett), Katee Sackhoff (Bo-Katan Kryze), Emily Swallow (the Armorer), Daniel Logan (young Boba Fett), and Jeremy Bulloch (Boba Fett from the original trilogy). Also included are indispensable episode guides for The Book of Boba Fett and all three seasons of The Mandalorian.

starwarsinsiderfictioncollectionvolume1.human_name: Star Wars Insider Fiction Collection Volume 1
starwarsinsiderfictioncollectionvolume1.description_text:
18 fully illustrated short stories.

Darth Vader confronts a mysterious face from Anakin Skywalker’s past… Lando Calrissian faces the terrifying power of an Imperial walker… The Empire’s stormtroopers ruthlessly pursue survivors from Alderaan… A squadron of B-wing fighters engage in a desperate mission during the Battle of Endor…

This special edition includes stories from the Legends era and tales from the current era of storytelling that were first published in Star Wars Insider.

Featuring stories by Timothy Zahn, Christie Golden, Matthew Stover, Jason Fry, Michael Reeves and Maya Kaathryn Bohnoff, Ryder Windham, John Ostrander, Jeff Grubb, David J. Williams and Mark S. Williams, Ari Marmell, Alexander Freed, and Karen Miller. Illustrated by Greg and Tim Hildebrandt, Jan Duursema, John Van Fleet, Joe Corroney, Brian Miller, Tom Hodges, Brian Rood, Chris Trevas, and David Rabbitte.

developers.developer-name: Timothy Zahn, Christie Golden, Matthew Stover, Jason Fry, Michael Reeves, Maya Kaathryn Bohnoff, Ryder Windham, John Ostrander, Jeff Grubb, David J. Williams, Mark S. Williams, Ari Marmell, Alexander Freed, Karen Miller

starwarsinsiderfictioncollectionvolume2.human_name: Star Wars Insider Fiction Collection Volume 2
starwarsinsiderfictioncollectionvolume2.description_text:
20 fully illustrated short stories.

Princess Leia Organa embarks on a vital mercy mission… Obi-Wan Kenobi escorts a precious cargo to Tatooine… A journalist uncovers the sinister truth about Orson Krennic… Lando Calrissian takes a deadly gamble on Lothal…

This special edition includes stories from the Legends era and tales from the current era of storytelling that were first published in Star Wars Insider.

Featuring stories by Timothy Zahn, John Jackson Miller, Delilah S. Dawson, Jason Fry, Michael Kogge, Alexander Freed, James S.A. Corey, Jennifer Heddle, Jason Hough, Joe Schreiber, Janine K. Spendlove, Edward M. Erdelac, Mur Lafferty, Sylvain Neuvel, and Paul S. Kemp. Illustrated by Magali Villeneuve, Drew Baker, John Van Fleet, Joe Corroney, Brian Miller, Carsten Bradley, Tom Hodges, Brian Rood, Marek Okon, Jose Cabrera, Jason Chan, David Rabbitte, and Chris Scalf.

developers.developer-name: Timothy Zahn, John Jackson Miller, Delilah S. Dawson, Jason Fry, Michael Kogge, Alexander Freed, James S.A. Corey, Jennifer Heddle, Jason Hough, Joe Schreiber, Janine K. Spendlove, Edward M. Erdelac, Mur Lafferty, Sylvain Neuvel, Paul S. Kemp.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume4.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 4
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume4.description_text:
Explore the Galaxy far, far away.

Four decades after the original Star Wars was released, changing cinema forever, the saga continues with all-new movies, books, comics, video games, and TV spin-offs.

This collection of interviews and behind-the-scenes features includes: Daisy Ridley on playing Rey in The Force Awakens, an exploration of rare prototype toys that never made it into stores, and Mark Hamill’s thoughts on working with Sir Alec Guinness!

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume6_heroesofthe.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 6: Heroes of the Force
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume6_heroesofthe.description_text: This comprehensive guide to the heroes of the light side, taken from the pages of Star Wars Insider, presents interviews with Mark Hamill on being Luke Skywalker, Samuel L. Jackson (Mace Windu), Alec Guinness and Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi), cast members from the animated series’ The Clone Wars and Star Wars Rebels – along with articles that delve into the passion and power behind the light side of the Force.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume7_iconsoftheg.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 7: Icons of the Galaxy
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume7_iconsoftheg.description_text:
Star Wars: Icons of the Galaxy celebrates some of the most memorable elements of the saga, whether it be timeless characters such as Princess Leia, Darth Vader, and Luke Skywalker, notable scenes, or even much-loved collectibles.

This collection explores iconic highlights of the saga, including interviews with Carrie Fisher and Harrison Ford, a comprehensive look at the legendary Marvel comic-book adaptation, and even more extraordinary characteristics that make Star Wars so unique.

The ultimate exploration of the space fantasy and its icons that changed the world!

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume2.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 2
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume2.description_text:
Inside the greatest movie saga of them all!

From interviews with the cast and crew to expert analysis of the characters from leading Star Wars writers, this book showcases the Star Wars phenomenon in exhaustive detail.

This essential collection features the exclusive true story of George Lucas’s struggle to bring Star Wars to the big screen, and how his love of fast-moving vehicles shaped the saga.

A must for Star Wars fans, this retrospective also includes the cast and crew of Star Wars: The Clone Wars on Attack of the Clones, Mark Hamill on life at a Star Wars convention, and what it was really like to work with Jabba the Hutt.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume3.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 3
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume3.description_text:
Go inside the ultimate space saga!

From exclusive behind-the-scenes interviews to in-depth articles by leading Star Wars writers, this collection covers the entire Star Wars saga from blockbuster movies to award-winning animated TV shows via comic books, novels, video games, and even radio shows!

This indispensable guide unearths the meaning of the Force, unveils the 50 greatest reasons to love the Star Wars prequels, and celebrates Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back with the cast and crew as they take a look back at the making of the iconic movie.

bookofbobafett.human_name: Star Wars: The Book of Boba Fett Collector's Edition
bookofbobafett.description_text:
The legendary Boba Fett has returned! Upon emerging from the Sarlacc and reclaiming his armor, he is making a name for himself as the new Daimyo of Tatooine, a position previously held by the notorious Jabba the Hutt.

Learn about Boba Fett and his crew and become immersed in the continuing story of one of the greatest bounty hunters the galaxy has ever seen! Featuring an episodic guide and in-depth information on the various characters, droids, creatures, and vehicles, all lavishly illustrated with final frames and amazing concept art, prepare to enter the dangerous world of The Book of Boba Fett.

bestofstarwarsinsidervolume8_thesagabegi.human_name: The Best of Star Wars Insider Volume 8: The Saga Begins
bestofstarwarsinsidervolume8_thesagabegi.description_text:
Star Wars: The Saga Begins celebrates Episodes I-III of the Star Wars saga: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith.

This collection includes classic interviews with Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Liam Neeson, and George Lucas, as they discuss telling the story of Anakin Skywalker’s rise and subsequent fall against the backdrop of a burgeoning galactic war.

Also featured are interviews with key members of the visual effects team charged with bringing George Lucas’ singular vision to life.

firstbook.description_text:
Donations to support First Book are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

First Book is a nonprofit social enterprise that provides new books and educational resources to programs and schools serving children in need. By making new, high-quality books and resources available on an ongoing basis, First Book is transforming the lives of children in need and elevating the quality of education. For more information, visit www.firstbook.org.

Over 30 million American kids live in poverty. First Book wants to see every single one of them read, learn and succeed. A nonprofit social enterprise, First Book makes new, high-quality books available to schools and programs serving children from low-income families. More than 120,000 educators and program leaders have joined First Book to access outstanding educational resources for free or deeply reduced prices. Together we can reach every child, every classroom and every community. Learn more about how you can support kids in need at www.firstbook.org.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: The Essential Star Wars Insider Collection
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: The definitive Star Wars publication bundle.
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Star Wars: The Galaxy's Greatest Heroes, Star Wars: The Mandalorian Guide to Season One, Star Wars: Solo A Star Wars Story Ultimate Guide, Star Wars Insider: The High Republic: Starlight Stories, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Since 1987, Star Wars Insider has been the definitive source for all things Star Wars and we’re pleased to offer our members exclusive access to The Essential Star Wars Insider Collection! Go behind-the-scenes of your favorite Star Wars movies and TV shows--including all three trilogies and the standalone films Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and Solo: A Star Wars Story--and TV epics including The Clone Wars and The Mandalorian. These volumes are packed with cast and crew interviews, concept art and photography from the Lucasfilm Archives. There's even fiction from the first phase of The High Republic publishing initiative, written by New York Times bestselling authors Justina Ireland, Cavan Scott, and Charles Soule. This bundle is your essential companion to nearly 50 years of Star Wars. Become one with The Force and help support First Book with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.
from_bundle.author: Titan Publishing Group

basic_data.human_name: Humble Video Learning Bundle: Unlock Pro 3D Modeling Skills with Blender by Packt
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: 3D modeling has never been more popular and widely available—get into the action and start creating for yourself with our latest bundle by Packt! Render, animate, model, and more in 3D with hot Blender tutorials like Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4, Geometry Nodes For Blender 4.4, and more. Get the professional-quality guides you need to create and manipulate 3D objects, characters, and environments, and more. Plus, your purchase helps support Alzheimer's Research UK!
basic_data.description:
Unlock awesome 3D tools for Blender. 3D modeling has never been more popular and widely available—get into the action and start creating for yourself with our latest bundle by Packt! Render, animate, model, and more in 3D with hot Blender tutorials like Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4, Geometry Nodes For Blender 4.4, and more. Get the professional-quality guides you need to create and manipulate 3D objects, characters, and environments, and more. Plus, your purchase helps support Alzheimer's Research UK!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,767. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys redeemable on Packt website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Alzheimers Research UK. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

blendertounrealengine5_fantasyriver3ddio.human_name: Blender to Unreal Engine 5 - Fantasy River 3D Diorama Boat Scene
blendertounrealengine5_fantasyriver3ddio.description_text: This course takes you from Blender fundamentals to a fully realized 3D diorama in Unreal Engine 5. You’ll build and texture detailed terrain, model intricate props like boats and lanterns, and optimize assets for real-time rendering. Learn expert techniques in lighting, foliage, and VFX to create a professional-quality fantasy river scene.

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
If nothing changes, one in two people will be directly affected by dementia. They will either care for someone with the condition, develop it themselves, or both. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

blenderlightingandcompositingforbeginner.description_text: Embark on a journey to illuminate your 3D scenes with our Blender Lighting & Compositing course, tailored for beginners to learn essential techniques and tools for stunning visuals.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

blendergeometrynodesforbeginners_foliage.human_name: Blender Geometry Nodes for Beginners - Foliage Scatter
blendergeometrynodesforbeginners_foliage.description_text: Unlock the potential of procedural modeling in Blender with this beginner-friendly course on Geometry Nodes. Learn to design and shape curve-based bridges, add intricate stone paths, and master essential node workflows. By the end, you'll have the skills to create customizable, non-destructive 3D structures for your projects.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

proceduralmazebuilding_unity6andblenderc.human_name: Procedural Maze Building - Unity 6 and Blender Compatible
proceduralmazebuilding_unity6andblenderc.description_text: Create procedural mazes using Unity techniques and design modular assets in Blender. Implement maze algorithms, automate placement with C# scripting, and build multi-story environments. Optimize models, add lighting, and refine navigation for immersive, replayable game worlds with dynamic dungeons and corridors.

geometrynodesblender44.description_text: Dive into Blender 4.4’s Geometry Nodes and learn to create dynamic, procedural environments from scratch. This course guides you through both technical fundamentals and creative application. Perfect for 3D artists ready to harness the full potential of node-based workflows.

blender4geometrynodesforbeginners.description_text: Unlock the power of 3D design with Blender 4 Geometry Nodes. This beginner-friendly course guides you through creating intricate 3D staircases and railings from scratch.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

blender4ultimateguide.description_text: Dive into the world of 3D modeling with our Blender 4 Ultimate Guide, designed to teach you from basic asset management to advanced environmental design, preparing you for professional 3D projects.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

materialfundamentals_proceduraltexturesi.human_name: Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4
materialfundamentals_proceduraltexturesi.description_text: Gain practical skills in procedural material creation using Blender 4.4. Explore shader logic, node setups, and real-world textures across a project-based learning path for aspiring 3D artists.

blenderandpythonscripting_astep-by-stepg.human_name: Blender and Python Scripting - A Step-by-Step Guide for Beginners
blenderandpythonscripting_astep-by-stepg.description_text: Unlock Blender's full potential by learning how to script with Python. This beginner-focused course takes you from Python basics to creating complex 3D object automation in Blender. No prior coding or 3D experience required—just curiosity and commitment.

proceduralweapongenerationwithblender44.description_text: Design and automate weapon creation workflows using Blender 4.4. This course teaches procedural modeling, geometry nodes, and Python scripting to build export-ready assets. Ideal for 3D artists aiming to level up with automation and generative design.

blender4geometrynodesworkshop_junglevine.human_name: Blender 4 Geometry Nodes Workshop - Jungle Vines
blender4geometrynodesworkshop_junglevine.description_text: Dive into procedural modeling with Blender 4’s Geometry Nodes as you create intricate jungle vines from scratch. Learn to control curves, set up random spawn points, refine mesh parameters, apply textures, and animate your creations with precision. By the end, you'll have a fully customizable vine system ready for dynamic 3D environments.

blendergeometrynodesforbeginners_procedu.human_name: Blender Geometry Nodes for Beginners - Procedural Bridge Generator
blendergeometrynodesforbeginners_procedu.description_text: Unlock the potential of procedural modeling in Blender with this beginner-friendly course on Geometry Nodes. Learn to design and shape curve-based bridges, add intricate stone paths, and master essential node workflows. By the end, you’ll have the skills to create customizable, non-destructive 3D structures for your projects.

masterinventorysystemcreation_unity6andb.human_name: Master Inventory System Creation - Unity 6 & Blender Fundamentals
masterinventorysystemcreation_unity6andb.description_text: Create an advanced inventory system in Unity using C# and UI elements while integrating custom 3D assets from Blender. Learn item management, interactive UI design, and real-world game development workflows.

blender44foundations_fundamentalblenderk.description_text: Begin your Blender journey with this comprehensive foundation course tailored for version 4.4. Learn essential tools, workflows, and best practices across modeling, materials, lighting, and rendering. Perfect for newcomers aiming to build professional 3D skills from the ground up.

towerdefensegamedevelopment_unity6andble.human_name: Tower Defense Game Development - Unity 6 and Blender Compatible
towerdefensegamedevelopment_unity6andble.description_text: Create a fully functional Tower Defense game with Unity and Blender. This course covers AI mechanics, pathfinding, turret placement, UI design, and 3D asset creation. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, you'll gain essential skills to build an immersive and engaging strategy game.

blender4_theultimateenvironmentartistsgu.human_name: Blender 4 - The Ultimate Environment Artist's Guide
blender4_theultimateenvironmentartistsgu.description_text: Learn 3D environment creation in Blender 4 with a focus on Victorian-style scenes. This course covers modeling, texturing, and rendering, from architecture to intricate props. By the end, you'll create a photorealistic urban setting ready for high-quality renders.

blendergeometrynodes_boats.description_text: Explore the process of creating a boat model in Blender using Geometry Nodes. From understanding lofting techniques to adding intricate details like supports, timber borders, and seats, this course offers a comprehensive approach. By the end, you'll have the skills to craft realistic boats with advanced node-based workflows.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

3dtreeswithblendergeometrynodes.description_text: Learn how to create intricate, procedural 3D trees using Blender's Geometry Nodes. This course guides you through every detail, from base generation to falling leaf effects. By the end, you'll master a fully node-driven approach to nature modeling.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

blendertounrealengine5thecompletebeginne.human_name: Blender to Unreal Engine 5 The Complete Beginners Guide
blendertounrealengine5thecompletebeginne.description_text: Embark on a journey from Blender to Unreal Engine 5, learning to create stunning 3D scenes and assets with step-by-step guidance tailored for beginners.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

stylizedenvironmentswithblender4geometry.human_name: Stylized Environments with Blender 4 Geometry Nodes
stylizedenvironmentswithblender4geometry.description_text: Bring your 3D environments to life with Blender 4 and Geometry Nodes! This course covers everything from fundamental modeling techniques to advanced texturing, shading, and environmental detailing. Whether you’re crafting stylized buildings, realistic terrains, or intricate props, you'll gain the skills to create visually rich, optimized scenes.

mastercharacterdesigninblenderforunityun.human_name: Master Character Design in Blender for Unity, Unreal Engine
mastercharacterdesigninblenderforunityun.description_text: Learn to create stunning 3D characters in Blender, complete with professional rigging and realistic animations. Discover how to design game environments, import assets into Unity and Unreal Engine, and publish your own character-based game. Gain practical skills that empower you to bring your game development vision to life.

blender4creatorcoursestylized3dmodels.description_text: Dive into the art of stylized 3D tavern modeling with Blender 4, offering comprehensive lessons from basic concepts to advanced texturing and lighting techniques, designed to elevate your 3D artistry.

developers.developer-name: 3D Tudor Limited By Neil Ian Bettison

blender4modelingandgeometrynodeworkshop.human_name: Blender 4 Modeling and Geometry Node Workshop
blender4modelingandgeometrynodeworkshop.description_text: Master 3D modeling in Blender 4 with this comprehensive workshop. Learn essential techniques, from viewport navigation and asset management to advanced geometry nodes, texturing, and rendering. Build detailed architectural structures, optimize workflows, and create professional-quality 3D environments with industry-leading tools and techniques.

blender4_themodularandkitbashenvironment.human_name: Blender 4 - The Modular and Kitbash Environment Guide
blender4_themodularandkitbashenvironment.description_text: This course dives into the world of modular 3D environment design in Blender 4. Learn how to structure and optimize large scenes using kitbash techniques, efficient modeling workflows, and advanced shading. By the end, you’ll be able to create stunning, game-ready environments with professional-quality assets and textures.

blenderbeginnersmasterclass_thecookiefac.human_name: Blender Beginners Masterclass - The Cookie Factory
blenderbeginnersmasterclass_thecookiefac.description_text: Embark on an exciting 3D modeling adventure in Blender by creating a fully functional cookie factory! This beginner-friendly masterclass takes you step by step through modeling, texturing, shading, lighting, and animation techniques. By the end, you'll have a stunning animated factory, ready for rendering and showcase.

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
If nothing changes, one in two people will be directly affected by dementia. They will either care for someone with the condition, develop it themselves, or both. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Unlock Pro 3D Modeling Skills with Blender by Packt
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Geometry Nodes For Blender 4.4, Blender 4 Geometry Nodes for Beginners, Blender 4.4 Foundations - Fundamental Blender Knowledge, Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: 3D modeling has never been more popular and widely available—get into the action and start creating for yourself with our latest bundle by Packt! Render, animate, model, and more in 3D with hot Blender tutorials like Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4, Geometry Nodes For Blender 4.4, and more. Get the professional-quality guides you need to create and manipulate 3D objects, characters, and environments, and more. Plus, your purchase helps support Alzheimer's Research UK!
from_bundle.author: Packt

basic_data.human_name: Humble RPG Bundle: Pathfinder Second Edition Asian Fantasy Bundle by Paizo
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: A world of adventure & magic awaits, and the only thing missing is your hero’s courage. Gather your party of trusty companions for epic adventures with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Paizo Inc. The new Pathfinder Second Edition Asian Fantasy Bundle contains countless hours of new campaigns and guides like Pathfinder Adventure Path: Fists of the Ruby Phoenix and Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high fantasy journey together, and help support Stop AAPI Hate with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Become the hero of Golarion. A world of adventure & magic awaits, and the only thing missing is your hero’s courage. Gather your party of trusty companions for epic adventures with our latest Pathfinder bundle from Paizo Inc. The new Pathfinder Second Edition Asian Fantasy Bundle contains countless hours of new campaigns and guides like Pathfinder Adventure Path: Fists of the Ruby Phoenix and Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide. Get everything you need to embark on an epic high fantasy journey together, and help support Stop AAPI Hate with your purchase!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $691. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access keys.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available through Paizo's website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Stop AAPI Hate. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

pathfinderflip-mat_alienruins.description_text: Whether it's a partially buried space ship that crash landed eons ago, or a strange landscape of eerie architecture not of this world, these alien ruins will surely fill your game with mystery and wonder. This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. The next time your players stumble across something out of this world, these maps have you covered. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Alien Ruins, you'll be ready the next time your players stumble upon the truly unexpected!

pathfinderflip-mat_undergroundcitymulti-.description_text: Be they complex fortified settlements built ages ago by long-gone ancients or more recent creations still populated by a vibrant society, underground cities present an unusual and complex adventuring environment. This four-sided Flip-Mat collection provides four huge panels of underground city environments and providing a diverse set of subterranean urban battlefields suitable for any fantasy RPG campaign. This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. The next time your players delve into the deepest chambers carved within the planet's crust, these maps have you covered. With Pathifnder Flip-Mat: Darklands Dangers Multi-Pack, you'll be ready the next time your players delve into the depths of the world!

pathfinderflip-matclassics_anceintdungeo.description_text: Descend into forgotten ruins with Pathfinder Flip-Mat Classics: Ancient Dungeon! This durable Flip-Mat provides two ready-to-use maps on which adventurers can explore monster-filled chambers and deadly trap-choked corridors. Prepare for a dungeon delve of epic proportions with Pathfinder Flip-Mat Classics: Ancient Dungeon!

pathfinderflip-mat_junglemulti-pack.description_text: What forgotten mysteries and deadly perils await in the depths of the jungle? No Game Master wants to put the action on pause to draw every overgrown ruin or tangle of tropical trees. Fortunately, you don’t have to! Pathfinder Flip-Mats provide ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Whether the heroes seek to explore an overgrown ruin, navigate a twisting pathway, discover a hidden waterfall, or seek shelter in a local village, these jungle scenes have you covered with four different combat maps in all! Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Jungle Multi-Pack, you’ll be ready next time your players head into the jungle!

pathfindercharactersheetpack.description_text: Create characters of legend and organize your most epic adventures with the Pathfinder Character Sheet Pack. This package includes: A folder to store character sheets, with reference information such as game actions, a summary of crucial conditions, and death and dying rules. A specialized character sheet for each class from the Pathfinder Core Rulebook, with class features and special actions already filled in. One standard character sheet suitable for a character of any class. Expanded sheets to track character inventory, campaign notes, and spells, plus a specialized sheet for animal companions and alchemy books.

fistsoftherubyphoenixplayersguide.human_name: Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Player's Guide
fistsoftherubyphoenixplayersguide.description_text:
"The powerful sorcerer Hao Jin has returned to the Material Plane to preside as grand judge over her world-famous fighting competition, the Ruby Phoenix Tournament. Contenders from around Golarion flock to the tournament to compete for a prize from Hao Jin’s legendary treasure vault. Does your team have what it takes to become this year’s Ruby Phoenix Champions?

Inside the Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Player’s Guide, you’ll discover spoiler-free details on:
